description: AI-classified sports analytics research papers from the Living Sports Analytics platform

schema.sport: Primary sport (football, basketball, tennis, etc. or not_applicable for non-sport papers)
schema.methodology: Research methodology (statistical, machine_learning, deep_learning, review, etc.)
schema.is_womens_sport: Whether the study focuses on women's/girls' sport
schema.data_type: Primary data type (event, tracking, video, survey, etc.)
schema.summary: AI-generated one-sentence summary of the key finding
schema.relevance: Relevance scores (0-10) for sports_analytics, sports_medicine, sports_management

data.title: An Experimental Investigation of Gust-induced Airfoil Stall Flutter
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Aeronautical engineering study of airfoil stall flutter in wind tunnel; not related to sports.

data.title: An Experimental Investigation of Gust-induced Airfoil Stall Flutter

data.title: The Cost of a Bet After PASPA
data.journal: ISU Red - Research and eData (Illinois State University)
data.sub_theme: bookmaker margins, PASPA repeal impact
data.summary: Analysis of 87,584 bookmaker-sport-month observations across 610 leagues worldwide reveals that bookmaker margins rose sharply following the 2018 repeal of PASPA, reflecting increased transaction costs for bettors.

data.title: Impact of the Paleocene–Eocene Thermal Maximum (PETM) on organic petrographic characteristics of the basal Pabdeh Formation at Kuh-e-Gurpi Anticline, SW Iran
data.summary: Geological study of organic petrography and paleoclimate change; not related to sports.

data.title: Different Exercises for Prevention and Treatment of Brain Disorders in Older Adults: A Review Study
data.sub_theme: Exercise interventions for neurodegenerative diseases in aging
data.summary: Scoping review of 56 studies examining effects of various exercise types on neurological disorders in older adults, finding moderate-to-high intensity interval training combined with cognitive exercises most beneficial.

data.title: Stance in REF submissions: Authorial positioning in impact Narratives
data.journal: UEA Digital Repository (University of East Anglia)
data.sub_theme: Academic rhetorical analysis of Research Excellence Framework submissions
data.summary: Rhetorical analysis of 6361 REF case studies examining authorial stance and persuasive strategies, finding significant use of self-mention, hedges, and boosters with discipline-specific variation.

data.title: The Harmonic Manifold ℋ - Foundations for a Geometric Theory of Reality from Irrational Interference
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Theoretical physics proposal for a Harmonic Manifold framework based on interference of irrational numbers, claiming to unify prime distribution, particle physics, and consciousness with 12 falsifiable predictions.

data.title: The Harmonic Manifold ℋ - Foundations for a Geometric Theory of Reality from Irrational Interference
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Theoretical physics paper on harmonic manifold geometry; not related to sports.

data.title: Exercise modalities in older adults with hypertension: a bibliometric mapping of research on strength, endurance, and balance for cardiovascular health
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: Bibliometric mapping of exercise research in aging
data.summary: Bibliometric analysis of 579 publications on exercise modalities (strength, endurance, balance) for older adults with hypertension, identifying research gaps in hypertension-specific outcomes and emerging trends.

data.title: Exercise modalities in older adults with hypertension: a bibliometric mapping of research on strength, endurance, and balance for cardiovascular health
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: Bibliometric mapping of exercise research in aging
data.summary: Bibliometric analysis of 579 publications on exercise modalities (strength, endurance, balance) for older adults with hypertension, identifying research gaps in hypertension-specific outcomes and emerging trends.

data.title: Uniform Neuromuscular Responses Across Varied Blood Flow Restriction Training Strategies
data.journal: The Journal of Strength and Conditioning Research
data.sub_theme: blood flow restriction training neuromuscular responses
data.summary: In 17 recreationally active females, low-load blood flow restriction training with varied set and repetition schemes (1×75, 3×, 1× to failure) produced uniform neuromuscular responses via EMG, with single-set-to-failure protocol achieving maximal acute effects.

data.title: Injury Patterns and Trends in US Cheerleading: A Systematic Review of an Understudied Sport
data.sub_theme: cheerleading injury patterns and trends
data.summary: Systematic review of 14 studies covering 28,998 cheerleaders (96.5% female) identified 239,361 injuries with ankle injuries most common, followed by head/brain/neck injuries, predominantly during practice, highlighting need for standardized injury reporting systems.

data.title: Aesthetic efficacy of resin infiltration on post-orthodontic white spot lesions using different conditioning methods: 24-month randomized control follow-up
data.sub_theme: orthodontic white spot lesion treatment
data.summary: 24-month randomized controlled trial comparing HCl gel, phosphoric acid gel, Er:YAG laser, and brushing as conditioning methods for resin infiltration of post-orthodontic white spot lesions.

data.title: Programa de desarrollo del conocimiento teórico en jóvenes futbolistas a través de la enseñanza comprensiva del deporte
data.sub_theme: tactical understanding, Teaching Games for Understanding (TGfU)
data.summary: A 13-session Teaching Games for Understanding (TGfU) program with reflective strategies significantly improved theoretical knowledge and tactical understanding in U12 football players.

data.title: Estimation of Control Intervals for Reinforcement Learning-Based Manufacturing-Line Control
data.journal: Journal of Computing and Information Science in Engineering
data.summary: Reinforcement learning method for optimizing manufacturing line control intervals using discrete-event simulation, unrelated to sports.

data.title: Melodies of the forest: Nature as an improvisational space for shared creative embodiment
data.summary: Case study of musical improvisation in forest environments using unsupervised machine learning and thematic analysis to assess emotional well-being, unrelated to sports.

data.title: Studies on Selective Neuroregeneration in Lower Vertebrates
data.summary: Study of selective neuroregeneration and axonal reinnervation patterns in frogs and goldfish using behavioral and electrophysiological mapping, unrelated to sports.

data.title: Returning to School Safely: A COVID-19 RCCE Initiative in the Eastern Mediterranean Region
data.summary: WHO Eastern Mediterranean regional risk communication and community engagement initiative for safe school reopening during COVID-19 pandemic, unrelated to sports.

data.title: PENGARUH STRUKTUR MODAL, PROFITABILITAS DAN KEBIJAKAN DEVIDEN TERHADAP NILAI PERUSAHAAN MANUFAKTUR OTOMOTIF DI BEI
data.summary: Panel regression analysis of automotive manufacturing firm valuations examining effects of capital structure, profitability, and dividend policy on Indonesian stock exchange companies, unrelated to sports.

data.title: The Effects of Acute Stroboscopic Training on Tennis Serve Return Accuracy
data.sub_theme: anticipation training, serve return
data.summary: A single stroboscopic training session significantly improved serve direction anticipation accuracy in intermediate tennis players compared to controls, though reaction times showed no difference.

data.title: The Impact of ESG Performance on Financial Performance: Evidence from Listed Companies in Thailand
data.summary: Study of ESG performance and financial outcomes in Thai companies using regression and Granger causality tests; not sports-related.

data.title: Rethinking Cost–Benefit Analysis for Infrastructure Projects: Insights from Japan’s Official Development Assistance Loan Projects
data.summary: Analysis of cost-benefit analysis methods for infrastructure project appraisal in Japan's ODA loans; not sports-related.

data.title: Do Productivity Standards Impact Clinical Decision Making for Speech-Language Pathologists?
data.journal: Perspectives of the ASHA Special Interest Groups
data.summary: Survey of speech-language pathologists finds weak associations between productivity standards and reported unethical workplace behaviors in clinical care.

data.title: ANALISIS TINGKAT KEPUASAN KERJA KARYAWAN PADA YAYASAN ABC
data.summary: Study analyzes job satisfaction levels among teachers and staff at ABC Foundation educational institution and identifies factors affecting employee motivation and performance.

data.title: Are we researching the right questions? Bibliometric analysis of undergraduate nursing thesis alignment with Peru's health priorities
data.journal: Frontiers in Research Metrics and Analytics
data.sub_theme: bibliometric analysis
data.summary: Bibliometric analysis of 6,157 Peruvian undergraduate nursing theses reveals strong thematic concentration in health domains with limited methodological diversity and intervention research.

data.title: Diverse Prairie Mixtures Stabilize Biomass Yields for Sustainable Aviation Fuel Production
data.summary: Seven-year multisite experiment shows that diverse native prairie seed mixtures produce more reliable and stable biomass yields for sustainable aviation fuel than monocultures.

data.title: Mixed-methods assessment of engagement with a digital intervention: The Wrapped feasibility randomised controlled trial
data.summary: Mixed-methods feasibility study of digital sexual health intervention for young people combines analytics, surveys, and interviews to assess behavioral, cognitive, and affective engagement.

data.title: Assessment of Performance and Uncertainty in Qualitative Analytical Chemistry: A Metrological Approach based on the Eurachem/CITAC guide
data.sub_theme: analytical chemistry measurement
data.summary: Review of Eurachem/CITAC metrological framework for assessing uncertainty and performance in qualitative analytical chemistry using standardized statistical approaches.

data.title: Harnessing Natural Sunlight for Solar-Driven Photocatalysis in Sustainable Agricultural Runoff Remediation
data.summary: Field evaluation of solar-driven photocatalytic reactor using TiO2 catalyst for agricultural runoff treatment, demonstrating predictable performance under natural sunlight with adaptive control strategies.

data.title: BIM-AR Interactive Data Accessibility in Cultural Heritage: a VPL Integrated Approach
data.journal: The international archives of the photogrammetry, remote sensing and spatial information sciences/International archives of the photogrammetry, remote sensing and spatial information sciences
data.summary: Integration of Augmented Reality and Heritage Building Information Modelling with visual programming algorithms to enable interactive real-time updating and valorization of cultural heritage sites.

data.title: Digital cognitive democracy and the public sphere in Indonesia’s electoral politics
data.summary: Theoretical analysis of Indonesia's 2019 and 2024 electoral cycles examining how social media platforms reshape political communication, participation, and democracy through the lens of public sphere and digital cognitive democracy.

data.title: Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy Investigation of Accelerated Erosion Mechanisms in Cement-Based Materials Under an Applied Electric Field
data.summary: Electrochemical investigation of accelerated sulfate erosion in 3D-printed cement composites using applied electric fields, revealing mechanisms of ion migration and durability degradation across material systems.

data.title: Design and application of a TiO2/clay/Ag hybrid nanocomposite for environmental remediation of cytotoxic pharmaceuticals
data.summary: Development and characterization of TiO2/clay/Ag hybrid nanocomposite catalyst achieving 100% photocatalytic degradation of cytostatic drug etoposide in water within 30 minutes with excellent reusability.

data.title: HyGage: Solving the Hysteresis Puzzle with a New Streamflow Monitoring Method
data.summary: New streamflow monitoring method (HyGage) based on shallow open channel flow equations enabling real-time discharge estimation in both steady and gradually varied flow conditions without reliance on semi-empirical techniques.

data.title: Git Good: An Introduction to GitHub for Collaboration
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: GitHub training workshop
data.summary: Training workshop on using GitHub for open-source collaboration and reproducible research, covering version control, pull requests, and project management.

data.title: Prevalence and predictors of body image distortion and dissatisfaction among school-going adolescents: A cross-sectional study
data.sub_theme: body image distortion and dissatisfaction in adolescents
data.summary: A cross-sectional study of 399 Indian adolescents found screen time, media exposure, and exercise levels significantly associated with body image distortion (χ²=47.98, p<0.001) and dissatisfaction, with no significant gender differences.

data.title: Prevalence of premenstrual syndrome, premenstrual dysphoric disorder, and dysmenorrhea in nursing students: a systematic review, meta-analysis, and evidence-based recommendations
data.journal: Frontiers in Global Women s Health
data.sub_theme: menstrual disorders in nursing students
data.summary: A meta-analysis of 20 studies (n=5,131) found high prevalence of premenstrual syndrome (62%), dysmenorrhea (72%), and PMDD (21%) in nursing students with significant academic and psychological impacts, yet limited access to structured interventions like exercise or yoga.

data.title: Application of telerehabilitation in home care for older adult patients with postoperative hip fractures: A scoping review
data.sub_theme: telerehabilitation for hip fracture recovery
data.summary: A scoping review and meta-analysis of 18 studies found telerehabilitation (video, mobile apps, WeChat) significantly improved hip function (HHS, p<0.001), walking ability (6MWT, p<0.0001), and quality of life in older adults recovering from hip fracture surgery, with higher exercise adherence.

data.title: Git Good: An Introduction to GitHub for Collaboration
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: GitHub training workshop
data.summary: Training workshop on using GitHub for open-source collaboration and reproducible research, covering version control, pull requests, and project management.

data.title: Multilingual Biographical Interviews With Migrated Young People: Translation Practices, Power Relations, and Epistemic Equality
data.sub_theme: multilingual interview research methods
data.summary: A qualitative methodological paper exploring translation practices, power relations, and epistemic equality in multilingual biographical interviews with migrated youth in state care, emphasizing reflexivity in research design.

data.title: Git Good: An Introduction to GitHub for Collaboration
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: GitHub collaboration workshop
data.summary: Training workshop on using GitHub for open science collaboration and reproducible research.

data.title: Agreement between muscle saturation breakpoints and lactate thresholds: Muscles comparison and sex difference in world‐class Nordic skiers
data.sub_theme: lactate threshold and muscle saturation breakpoints in Nordic skiing
data.summary: Near-infrared spectroscopy breakpoints (BP2) on vastus lateralis, biceps femoris, and biceps brachii showed very good accuracy for detecting lactate threshold in world-class Nordic skiers, with no significant sex differences between 29 males and 23 females.

data.title: Hamstring-to-quadriceps fatigue ratio in female professional football players
data.sub_theme: hamstring-to-quadriceps fatigue ratio in female football players
data.summary: In 15 professional female football players, a 30-repetition isokinetic fatigue test reduced hamstring-to-quadriceps strength ratio from 0.64 to 0.52, with greater hamstring fatigue (47% vs 34%), suggesting increased lower-limb injury risk when fatigued.

data.title: Differences in female athlete triad risk factors between Japanese and American female runners: A comparative study
data.sub_theme: female athlete triad risk factors, Japan vs USA
data.summary: Comparative study of 77 female distance runners (36 Japanese, 41 American) found Japanese runners had significantly lower bone mineral density and higher prevalence of energy deficiency (56% vs 32%) and stress fractures (50% vs 17%), despite similar BMI and menstrual patterns.

data.title: Subjectivity and moments of non-gendered embodiment: A discourse analysis of CrossFit women's bodies
data.journal: International Review for the Sociology of Sport
data.sub_theme: women's embodiment and gender identity in CrossFit
data.summary: Foucauldian discourse analysis of 14 South African female CrossFitters reveals how muscularity discourses construct women's bodies through sexual desirability and muscular dilemma tensions, enabling non-gendered embodiment.

data.title: Flexible Ba <sub>2</sub> LuTaO <sub>6</sub> :Tb <sup>3+</sup> /Eu <sup>3+</sup> Perovskites with Multicolor Luminescence and Photochromism for X‐Ray Imaging, Visual Dosimetry, and Encryption
data.sub_theme: X-ray imaging and encryption
data.summary: Tb3+/Eu3+-doped Ba2LuTaO6 perovskites demonstrate reversible photochromism and tunable multicolor luminescence for X-ray imaging, dosimetry, and anti-counterfeiting applications.

data.title: Distribution of Clomiphene and Its Metabolites in Antidoping Samples—A 3‐Year Perspective
data.sub_theme: anti-doping analysis
data.summary: Analysis of clomiphene and metabolite distribution in 325 antidoping urine samples over 3 years, evaluating WADA reporting criteria and detection windows.

data.title: Constructing Flower‐Like Ni‐Doped Co <sub>3</sub> O <sub>4</sub> Nanozyme With Abundant Oxygen Vacancies for Enhanced Peroxidase Mimetic Catalysis
data.sub_theme: nanozyme catalysis
data.summary: Ni-doped Co3O4 flower-like nanozyme with oxygen vacancies demonstrates enhanced peroxidase-like activity for H2O2 and phenol detection with excellent reusability.

data.title: Breaking Concentration Limits: High‐Efficiency Tm <sup>3+</sup> ‐Doped Double Perovskite UCL Enhanced by Plasmon Semiconductor Nanoparticles
data.sub_theme: upconversion luminescence materials
data.summary: Tm3+-doped Cs2NaYCl6 core-shell nanoparticles with dual perovskite coating achieve high-efficiency upconversion luminescence enhanced by plasmonic semiconductor nanoparticles for imaging and anti-counterfeiting.

data.title: Pr <sup>3+</sup> -Doped WO <sub>3</sub> 1D Yoga-Pillar-Shaped Nanorod Gas Sensor: A High-Performance Ppb-Level Triethylamine Gas Sensor for Fish Freshness Monitoring
data.sub_theme: gas sensor for food freshness
data.summary: Pr3+-doped WO3 1D nanorod gas sensor achieves ppb-level triethylamine detection with 3-fold faster response and higher sensitivity for fish freshness monitoring applications.

data.title: Design and Development of Sc0.2Al0.8N-Based Dual-Piezoelectric-Layer MEMS Hydrophone
data.sub_theme: MEMS hydrophone design
data.summary: Dual-piezoelectric-layer MEMS hydrophone based on scandium-doped aluminum nitride achieves −162 dB sensitivity across 20 Hz–50 kHz with enhanced performance for underwater acoustic sensing.

data.title: AI-enabled learning analytics use relates to physical literacy and engagement in university PE via smart teaching and personalised feedback
data.sub_theme: physical literacy, learning analytics, wearable technology, AI-enabled dashboards
data.summary: Mixed-methods study of 1,182 Chinese university PE students demonstrates that AI-enabled wearable learning analytics improve physical literacy and engagement primarily through pedagogical processes (smart teaching and personalized feedback) rather than direct data exposure.

data.summary: Study of affinity for nature development in youth through overnight summer camps using regression analysis, unrelated to sports.

data.summary: Analysis of brain drain and brain gain mechanisms in human capital mobility for economic development, unrelated to sports.

data.title: The Torque-Velocity Relationship and Second ACL Injury Risk
data.sub_theme: ACL reinjury prediction, torque-velocity relationship
data.summary: Quadriceps torque-velocity relationship measured via isokinetic testing significantly predicted ACL reinjury risk in 579 post-ACLR patients over 2+ years, with higher strength associated with increased reinjury odds.

data.title: Functional Training with Phygital Elements and Artificial Intelligence Integration
data.sub_theme: phygital technologies, AI integration in physical education, wearable sensors, gamification
data.summary: Review of phygital and AI-powered training technologies including smart simulators, telemetry, and wearable sensors for modernizing sports and physical education with adaptive programs and gamification.

data.title: Developing while performing and performing while developing? A case study of an integrated talent development and high performance sport environment at Munster Rugby
data.journal: International Journal of Sports Science & Coaching
data.sub_theme: junior-to-senior transition, integrated talent development environment
data.summary: Case study of Munster Rugby's integrated academy-senior squad model found full-time training accelerated learning and selection opportunities, but outcomes varied; success required individualized support and managing tension between winning and long-term development.

data.title: Integrating Unsupervised and Supervised Learning for the Prediction of Defensive Schemes in American football
data.sub_theme: defensive scheme prediction, coverage recognition
data.summary: Statistical framework integrating elastic net logistic regression and gradient-boosted trees with hidden Markov model features on player tracking data to predict defensive coverage schemes (man vs. zone) in American football.

data.title: A Non-asymptotic Analysis for Learning and Applying a Preconditioner in MCMC
data.sub_theme: preconditioner learning in Markov chain Monte Carlo algorithms
data.summary: This theoretical paper provides non-asymptotic analysis of computational costs for learning preconditioners in MCMC algorithms, establishing guarantees for preconditioned Unadjusted Langevin Algorithm.

data.title: Analisis Manajemen Sumber Daya Manusia: Keterkaitan Rekrutmen, Analisis Jabatan, Penilaian Kinerja, dan Kompensasi Karyawan
data.journal: Jurnal Inovasi Manajemen, Kewirausahaan, Bisnis dan Digital.
data.sub_theme: human resource management integration
data.summary: This literature review analyzes the integrated relationship between recruitment, job analysis, performance appraisal, and employee compensation in human resource management systems.

data.title: Cultivating intention to pursue health-related studies among a pilot group of high schoolers: establishing a baseline data
data.sub_theme: health career interest among high school students
data.summary: This pilot study establishes baseline data on health disparities knowledge and health career intentions among 75% of a Bronx high school's 2025 graduating class, identifying knowledge gaps in five health topics.

data.title: Exploring the effects of ICT, financial institutions and market access on CO2 emissions: insights from time-varying frequency quantile regression analysis
data.sub_theme: effects of ICT and financial institutions on CO2 emissions in China
data.summary: This study uses time-varying frequency quantile regression to analyze the effects of ICT, financial institutions, and market access on China's CO2 emissions across different time horizons.

data.title: Harnessing Innovative Traits of ICT, Math, Science, and Engineering Learners Contributory to Sustainable Development Goals
data.sub_theme: innovative traits in STEM learners for sustainable development
data.summary: This exploratory qualitative study uses reflexive thematic analysis of interviews with 20 STEM learners to identify innovative traits and behaviors that align with Sustainable Development Goals.

data.title: Slow focus sensor for the Keck I laser guide star adaptive optics system using focal plane wavefront sensing
data.sub_theme: focal plane wavefront sensing for laser guide star adaptive optics
data.summary: This technical paper develops and compares three focal plane wavefront sensing algorithms for slow focus tracking in the Keck I telescope's adaptive optics system, with on-sky validation.

data.title: Tennis Industry and Digital Transformation: Opportunities and Challenges
data.journal: International Journal of Education and Humanities
data.sub_theme: digital transformation in tennis industry
data.summary: This article analyzes how digital transformation is reshaping the tennis industry across event operations, athlete training, audience experience, and marketing, proposing strategic recommendations for industry adoption.

data.title: Robust Assortment Optimization from Observational Data
data.sub_theme: robust assortment optimization from observational data
data.summary: This paper proposes a robust framework for data-driven assortment optimization that accounts for distributional shifts in customer choice behavior, establishing sample complexity bounds for robust generalization.

data.title: Weak trophic position–body mass relationships undermine simple size-spectrum models for coral reefs
data.journal: Proceedings of the Royal Society B Biological Sciences
data.summary: Study of coral reef fish trophic structure using stable isotope analysis and biomass data challenges size-spectrum models by showing weak body mass-trophic position relationships.

data.title: Experimental Investigation of Rotating Bending Fatigue Life of Knuckle and Screw Threads in AISI 1045 Steel
data.sub_theme: fatigue behavior of threaded components under bending stress
data.summary: Experimental study comparing fatigue life of knuckle-thread versus screw-thread AISI 1045 steel specimens under rotating bending, demonstrating lower stress concentration factors and improved fatigue performance for knuckle threads through altered damage mechanisms.

data.title: Algebraic Analysis of the PCBR and the Jones Manoel 2026 Candidacy: The Luhmann–Maury Framework
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: algebraic modeling of political organization structure
data.summary: Algebraic and structural analysis of the Brazilian Communist Party using the Luhmann-Maury Framework to model political organizations across symbolic-discursive and material-institutional domains, revealing high asymmetry and structural risks for electoral candidacy.

data.title: Resolution of Matrix Multiplication Complexity to the O(n^2) Ground State via 6-Dimensional Hantzsche-Wendt Manifold Mapping
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: matrix multiplication computational complexity
data.summary: Theoretical work claiming resolution of matrix multiplication complexity to O(n^2) ground state through 6-dimensional Hantzsche-Wendt manifold mapping and complexity hardening methods with validation via Atiyah-Singer Index Theorem.

data.title: Processus de préparation des cytotoxiques injectables : gestion des risques par l’application de la méthode d’analyse des modes de défaillance, de leurs effets et de leur criticité
data.journal: The Canadian Journal of Hospital Pharmacy
data.sub_theme: risk analysis in injectable cytotoxic drug preparation
data.summary: Failure Mode and Effects Analysis (AMDEC) study of injectable chemotherapy preparation processes in a centralized unit, identifying 189 failure modes and achieving 23% reduction in criticality index through targeted risk mitigation interventions.

data.title: LOGISTICS APPROACH TO MARKETING DISTRIBUTION POLICY
data.sub_theme: logistics and marketing distribution policy in retail
data.summary: Conceptual article examining integration of marketing and logistics in retail sales management, analyzing distribution channels, intermediary activities, and material flows across product lifecycle for competitive advantage optimization.

data.title: Closed-Loop Environmental Governance for Carbon-Neutral Mega-Events: Institutional Design, Policy Tools, MRV, and Environmental Legacy of the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics
data.sub_theme: environmental governance and carbon neutrality assessment of Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics
data.summary: Integrated analytical framework evaluating Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics' carbon-neutral commitments through institutional design, monitoring-reporting-verification systems, and multi-dimensional environmental indicators, revealing sustained improvements benchmarked against national clean-air policies.

data.title: Resolution of Matrix Multiplication Complexity to the O(n^2) Ground State via 6-Dimensional Hantzsche-Wendt Manifold Mapping
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: matrix multiplication computational complexity
data.summary: Theoretical work claiming resolution of matrix multiplication complexity to O(n^2) ground state through 6-dimensional Hantzsche-Wendt manifold mapping and complexity hardening methods with validation via Atiyah-Singer Index Theorem.

data.title: Developability Evaluation of Single-Domain Antibody Chelator Conjugates for Diagnostic Radiotracers
data.summary: Development and validation of analytical assays for assessing stability and developability of single-domain antibody-chelator conjugates for diagnostic imaging applications.

data.title: Algebraic Analysis of the PCBR and the Jones Manoel 2026 Candidacy: The Luhmann–Maury Framework
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Algebraic and structural analysis of a Brazilian political organization using the Luhmann-Maury Framework to evaluate organizational readiness and asymmetry between symbolic and material capacity.

data.title: Geometric properties of slowly rotating black holes embedded in matter environments
data.summary: Theoretical astrophysics study of spacetime geometry around slowly rotating black holes embedded in dark matter environments using analytic modeling and geodesic analysis.

data.title: The effects of different exercise interventions on clinical outcomes of irritable bowel syndrome and their potential mechanisms: a systematic review and network meta-analysis
data.sub_theme: exercise for irritable bowel syndrome
data.summary: Network meta-analysis of 16 studies found moderate-intensity aerobic exercise and Pilates significantly reduced IBS symptoms and improved depression/anxiety scores, potentially through parasympathetic activation and gut microbiota modulation.

data.title: Health-promoting behaviors, physical activity, and health control perceptions among physical education and social science students in 2016 and 2026: implications for public health
data.sub_theme: health behaviors and physical activity in university students
data.summary: Longitudinal comparison of 752 students in 2016 vs. 2026 found significant increases in sedentary behavior and BMI, with declines in physical activity and internal health locus of control, particularly among social science students.

data.title: Evaluation approaches used to assess the quality of weight loss apps: a systematic review (Preprint)
data.sub_theme: weight loss app quality evaluation frameworks
data.summary: Systematic review of 11 studies evaluating 46 weight loss apps identified seven generic evaluation approaches, with Mobile App Rating Scale (MARS) and Evidence-based Strategies Assessment being most frequently used.

data.title: Anxiety and depression in athletes of different levels without current injury: a systematic review with meta-analyses
data.sub_theme: anxiety and depression prevalence in athletes
data.summary: Systematic review and meta-analysis of athletes across all competitive levels found prevalence of moderate/severe anxiety at 16% (12,893 athletes), depression at 18% (19,290 athletes), and 12-month incidence of combined anxiety/depression at 40% (611 athletes).

data.title: Remote exercise snacking and fall-related functional outcomes in older adults: a systematic review including a meta-analysis
data.sub_theme: fall prevention in older adults
data.summary: A meta-analysis of 10 studies (n=313) found that remote exercise snacking significantly improved lower-limb muscle strength (SMD=0.29, p=0.01) and endurance (SMD=0.24, p=0.04) in insufficiently active older adults, with potential benefits for fall prevention.

data.title: Lactate, Capnia, and Fat Oxidation as Therapeutic Axes for SARS-CoV-2 Spike Protein-Induced Sequelae
data.sub_theme: post-acute COVID-19 syndrome, metabolic dysfunction
data.summary: A review comparing post-acute COVID-19 syndrome metabolic alterations to endurance athlete physiology, proposing lactate threshold, CO2 oxygenation, and fat oxidation as therapeutic axes for managing persistent fatigue and exertional intolerance.

data.title: The effects of traditional mind-body exercises on cognitive function in neurodegenerative diseases or prodromal cognitive decline: a meta-analysis
data.sub_theme: cognitive function in neurodegenerative disease
data.summary: A meta-analysis of 21 RCTs found that traditional mind-body exercises (taichi, baduanjin, wuqinxi, yoga) significantly improved overall cognitive functioning (MMSE MD=0.65, p=0.004; MoCA MD=0.87, p=0.001) and executive function in patients with neurodegenerative diseases and prodromal cognitive decline.

data.title: The effects of traditional Chinese mind-body exercise on pulmonary rehabilitation in patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease: a systematic review and meta-analysis
data.sub_theme: pulmonary rehabilitation in COPD
data.summary: A meta-analysis of 22 RCTs (n=1,871) demonstrated that traditional Chinese mind-body exercises significantly improved lung function (FEV1 MD=0.20L, p<0.001), exercise capacity (6MWD MD=42.05m), and quality of life in COPD patients compared to usual care.

data.title: External Load of Professional Female Soccer Players in the Competitive Microcycle: Influence of Playing Position and Contextual Variables
data.journal: The Journal of Strength and Conditioning Research
data.sub_theme: external load by position and context
data.summary: GPS analysis of 18 professional Spanish women's soccer players across 13 microcycles found significant positional differences in explosive distance and high-speed running, with contextual factors (opponent quality, match location) influencing external load demands.

data.title: FIFA Connect Adoption: A Mixed-Methods Study in Moroccan Women's Football
data.journal: Journal of Sports and Physical Education Studies
data.sub_theme: technology adoption in women's football management
data.summary: A mixed-methods study of Moroccan women's football clubs found that Information Quality was the strongest predictor of FIFA Connect adoption, while System Quality was critically underperforming, with structural dependency on men's clubs and inadequate training limiting digital transformation.

data.title: Ankle-GO Score to Identify Elite Basketball Players Who Will Suffer Lateral Ankle Sprain During a Competitive Season: A 1-Year Prospective Cohort Study
data.journal: The American Journal of Sports Medicine
data.sub_theme: lateral ankle sprain prediction
data.summary: The Ankle-GO score, combining functional tests and self-reported questionnaires, successfully predicted lateral ankle sprain risk in elite basketball players, with scores <19 points and prior LAS history showing strongest predictive value.

data.title: Anthropometric Characteristics Associated with 2000 m Rowing Ergometer Performance in Adolescent Athletes
data.sub_theme: anthropometric determinants of rowing performance
data.summary: Anthropometric variables—particularly height, body mass, muscle mass, and body surface area—are strongly associated with 2000 m ergometer performance in adolescent rowers, with similar correlation patterns observed in both males and females across eight countries.

data.title: Who sleeps worse and why? An analysis of sex, chrononutrition, anxiety, and sleep in adolescent athletes
data.journal: International Journal of Sports Science & Coaching
data.sub_theme: sleep quality, anxiety, chrononutrition in adolescent athletes
data.summary: In 460 adolescent athletes, anxiety was the strongest correlate of poor sleep quality, and the sex gap in sleep quality was largely explained by higher anxiety in females, with later breakfast timing independently associated with worse sleep.

data.title: Effects of a 3-week foam rolling warm-up intervention on ankle dorsiflexion measurements and jumping performance in young rhythmic gymnasts
data.journal: BMC Sports Science Medicine and Rehabilitation
data.sub_theme: foam rolling warm-up effects on jumping and ankle dorsiflexion
data.summary: A 3-week foam rolling warm-up protocol in 26 young female rhythmic gymnasts significantly improved countermovement jump performance and angular dorsiflexion velocity, though not static ankle dorsiflexion range of motion.

data.title: Constructing Lanthanide Coordination Polymers for Luminescent Sensing of D <sub>2</sub> O and CH <sub>3</sub> OH Using Hierarchical Regulation Strategy from Structure to Function
data.summary: This paper develops lanthanide coordination polymers for luminescent sensing of deuterated water and alcohols using structural regulation strategies; not related to sports.

data.title: Hypersensitive detection of single millimeter vascular emboli from adhesive in vivo
data.summary: This paper develops a CT-visualized method for detecting millimeter-scale vascular emboli from surgical adhesives by doping bismuth oxychloride into the adhesive; not related to sports.

data.title: Effects of the Fe doping on the physical properties and LPG gas detection of Fe-doped SnO2 films deposited by DC sputtering
data.sub_theme: gas sensing materials
data.summary: Iron-doped SnO2 films synthesized via DC sputtering demonstrate altered gas sensing response to LPG at room temperature due to p-type carriers at particle surfaces.

data.title: Adsorption and Sensing Mechanisms of Transformer Dissolved Gases on Transition Metal-Doped MoTe <sub>2</sub> Monolayers: A DFT Study
data.sub_theme: transformer fault detection
data.summary: DFT study of transition metal-doped MoTe2 monolayers for detecting dissolved gases in transformers, with Au-MoTe2 and Ti-MoTe2 showing high sensitivity and fast recovery times.

data.title: Detection of specific concanavalin A based on mannose-immobilized silicon nanowire (SiNW) biosensors with tunable mannose ratios
data.sub_theme: biosensor development
data.summary: Mannose-immobilized silicon nanowire biosensors with tunable density enable selective detection of concanavalin A through lectin-glycan interactions with enhanced sensitivity.

data.title: Update on the Prime Vortex Theory: Fractal Phase-Convergence and Reconciliation of the "12.8" Discrepancy
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Mathematical retraction paper discussing failures in Prime Vortex Theory and Michikaze Resonance Equation; not related to sports.

data.title: Does Playing Time Impact Player Performance? A COVID-19 Natural Experiment
data.sub_theme: playing time effects on player performance, plus-minus, quantile regression
data.summary: COVID-19 natural experiment in Chinese Basketball Association shows domestic players with increased playing time exhibit significantly improved performance measured by plus-minus, field goal percentage, and points per minute with persistent gains beyond the immediate season.

data.title: Financial performance measurement of commercial bank in Bangladesh: An application of DuPont analysis
data.summary: DuPont analysis of commercial bank financial performance in Bangladesh; not related to sports.

data.title: Research Progress on Molecular Subtypes and Transdifferentiation Mechanisms of Hepatocellular Carcinoma
data.summary: Review of hepatocellular carcinoma molecular subtypes and transdifferentiation mechanisms; not related to sports.

data.title: Timing and Intensity of Rehabilitation Services During Acute Stroke Hospitalization: Impacts on Functional Recovery and Community Discharge
data.summary: Retrospective observational study of rehabilitation service delivery timing and intensity during acute stroke hospitalization using EMR data; not related to sports.

data.title: Optimistic World Models: Efficient Exploration in Model-Based Deep Reinforcement Learning
data.summary: Deep reinforcement learning framework for efficient exploration in model-based RL using optimistic world models; not related to sports.

data.title: Injury characteristics, outcome, and return to play after ankle sprains and Achilles tendon ruptures in tennis
data.journal: South African Journal of Sports Medicine
data.sub_theme: ankle sprains, Achilles tendon ruptures, return to play
data.summary: Retrospective study of recreational tennis players with ankle sprains and Achilles tendon ruptures shows 90% return-to-play rate for ankle sprains at mean 3.6 months versus 29% for Achilles ruptures, with most non-returners citing fear of re-injury rather than functional limitations.

data.title: Routing, Cascades, and User Choice for LLMs
data.sub_theme: game theory routing optimization
data.summary: Study models LLM provider routing decisions using Stackelberg game theory to analyze trade-offs between performance costs and user utility, revealing conditions for misalignment and throttling.

data.title: Ethical Chess v2.1
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: AI ethics framework
data.summary: Proposes an AI system prompt framework based on agape-centered ethics designed to balance user needs with system integrity.

data.title: Recycling Technologies for Cathode Materials from Spent Lithium Iron Phosphate Batteries: An Overview
data.sub_theme: lithium battery recycling technologies
data.summary: Comprehensive review of recycling technologies for spent lithium iron phosphate batteries across pyrometallurgical, direct regeneration, and emerging green approaches.

data.title: Meningkatkan Kreativitas Melalui Pengelolaan Pepaya Manjadi Produk Berkualitas: Pendampingan Kewirausahaan di Desa Bulay Pamekasan
data.sub_theme: entrepreneurship mentoring for papaya processing
data.summary: Participatory action research study providing entrepreneurship training and papaya processing guidance to improve community income and skills in rural Indonesia.

data.title: Analysis of Teachers Coordination with students at School level: A Performance Analysis
data.sub_theme: teacher coordination assessment
data.summary: Survey of 400 teachers using five-point Likert scale stratified sampling to measure teacher coordination effectiveness in school management.

data.title: Ethical Chess v2.1
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: AI ethics framework
data.summary: Proposes an AI system prompt framework based on agape-centered ethics designed to balance user needs with system integrity.

data.title: Machiavelli on the Primacy of the Political
data.sub_theme: Machiavelli political philosophy
data.summary: Philosophical essay analyzing Machiavelli's The Prince and Discourses on Livy to examine the relationship between theoretical assumptions and practical political goals.

data.title: A Study on the Impact of AI Intelligent Learning Tools on Students' Learning
data.journal: Lecture Notes in Education Psychology and Public Media
data.sub_theme: AI learning tools in education
data.summary: Meta-analysis of 28 peer-reviewed studies (2018-2024) examining AI tool integration in education, finding effectiveness depends on pedagogical approach rather than technological complexity.

data.title: A Task-Centric Theory for Iterative Self-Improvement with Easy-to-Hard Curricula
data.sub_theme: LLM self-improvement with curricula
data.summary: Theoretical analysis of iterative self-improvement for large language models, proving that easy-to-hard curricula achieve better finite-sample guarantees than fixed task mixtures.

data.title: A Deep Learning Framework for Forecasting Built-Up Area and Population to Support Land Use Efficiency Projections under SDG 11.3.1
data.journal: ISPRS annals of the photogrammetry, remote sensing and spatial information sciences
data.sub_theme: urban forecasting for sustainable development
data.summary: Deep learning framework using Conv1D-LSTM ensemble to forecast built-up area and population for 8,478 urban centers to support SDG 11.3.1 land use efficiency monitoring.

data.title: Artisan: Agentic Artifact Evaluation
data.sub_theme: automated artifact evaluation in software engineering
data.summary: This paper presents Artisan, an LLM-based automated agent for reproducing software engineering research results, and introduces Artisan-Bench, a benchmark of 60 tasks for evaluating artifact reproduction.

data.title: Development of Sustainable Strategy of Physical Education Teaching in Private Colleges in Shaanxi Province
data.sub_theme: sustainable physical education teaching in higher education
data.summary: This mixed-methods study develops and evaluates a strategic framework for sustainable physical education teaching in private colleges in China, identifying gaps in financial sustainability and community collaboration.

data.title: Modified design TWCI-based high step-up DC-DC converter with reduced elements and low input current ripple for renewable applications
data.sub_theme: high step-up DC-DC converter design for renewable energy
data.summary: A modified coupled inductor DC-DC converter topology achieves ultra-high voltage gain with reduced component count and low input current ripple, validated experimentally at 95.3% efficiency for photovoltaic and fuel-cell applications.

data.title: Very High Cycle Fatigue and Fatigue Crack Growth of Steels: A Review
data.sub_theme: fatigue crack initiation and propagation in high-strength steels
data.summary: A comprehensive review examines very high cycle fatigue behavior and crack propagation in high-strength steels, evaluating the influence of loading frequency, geometry, microstructure, and environmental conditions on fatigue performance.

data.title: SoilHealthDB-V2: An updated and standardized global database of soil health under conservation management
data.sub_theme: soil health database standardization and conservation management
data.summary: SoilHealthDB-V2 is an updated global database of soil health indicators across conservation practices, expanding observations to 8,874 and adding harmonized variables for cover crop management and carbon cycling assessment.

data.title: RaDRI: A computational model for radiosensitisation by DNA double strand break repair inhibitors
data.sub_theme: agent-based model for DNA repair inhibition and radiosensitization
data.summary: RaDRI is an agent-based computational model that simulates DNA double strand break repair and radiosensitization by DNA-PK inhibitors, incorporating explicit cell cycle checkpoints and predicting distinct mechanisms of radiosensitivity enhancement.

data.title: Cyclic active refrigerators
data.sub_theme: thermodynamic cycles in active particle systems
data.summary: Cyclic active refrigerators using active Brownian particles are modeled to show that coefficient of performance can exceed passive bounds and systems can function simultaneously as heat engines and refrigerators, violating classical thermodynamic limits.

data.title: Off the beaten track: rural perspectives on the conflict over the future of cycling in Bavaria
data.sub_theme: sustainable mobility and cycling advocacy in rural areas
data.summary: Qualitative content analysis of rural civil society perspectives on cycling infrastructure and sustainable mobility transition in Bavaria, revealing distinct rural conflict lines and mobilization patterns compared to urban initiatives.

data.title: Constructing a theoretical model based on grounded theory to evaluate the downstream effects of home caregiver burden in hemodialysis patients
data.sub_theme: caregiver burden in hemodialysis patients
data.summary: Grounded theory study of 80 family caregivers of hemodialysis patients developing a theoretical model of care burden's downstream effects, identifying five dimensions and a dynamic transmission pathway for clinical intervention.

data.title: Physically Interpretable AlphaEarth Foundation Model Embeddings Enable LLM-Based Land Surface Intelligence
data.sub_theme: satellite imagery interpretation and land surface intelligence
data.summary: Analysis of Google AlphaEarth foundation model embeddings using deep learning and interpretability methods to map satellite data to environmental variables, achieving high reconstruction fidelity and developing an LLM-based land surface intelligence system.

data.title: Unsupervised Anomaly Detection in High-Dimensional Vehicle Telemetry: A Predictive Maintenance Framework for Fleet Operations Utilizing Isolation Forests and Time-Series Analysis
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: predictive maintenance for fleet vehicles
data.summary: Application of isolation forests and time-series analysis for unsupervised anomaly detection in vehicle telemetry to predict mechanical failures in trucking fleet operations on standard laptops.

data.title: Unsupervised Anomaly Detection in High-Dimensional Vehicle Telemetry: A Predictive Maintenance Framework for Fleet Operations Utilizing Isolation Forests and Time-Series Analysis
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: predictive maintenance for fleet vehicles
data.summary: Application of isolation forests and time-series analysis for unsupervised anomaly detection in vehicle telemetry to predict mechanical failures in trucking fleet operations on standard laptops.

data.title: Effects of aquatic exercise on improving body composition and muscle strength in the older adults: a systematic review and meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials
data.sub_theme: aquatic exercise for older adults
data.summary: Meta-analysis of 19 RCTs (866 older adults) demonstrated aquatic exercise significantly improved muscle strength, flexibility, functional mobility, and reduced body fat percentage and cholesterol, but not BMI or HDL/LDL cholesterol.

data.title: Beyond Stigma&ndash;Integrating Neurobiology, Genetics, and Awareness Integration Theory in Addiction Recovery
data.journal: Dove Medical Press (Taylor and Francis Group)
data.sub_theme: addiction recovery neurobiology
data.summary: This paper addresses addiction recovery through integration of neurobiology and genetics; while one author is affiliated with a Center for Exercise and Sport Mental Health, the paper is primarily about addiction treatment and is not substantially about sport.

data.title: The 50 Highest Cited Papers on Patellofemoral Instability
data.sub_theme: patellofemoral instability research trends
data.summary: A bibliometric analysis of the 50 most-cited papers on patellofemoral instability found that 84% were clinical studies with level IV evidence, predominantly published in the 2000s in the American Journal of Sports Medicine, reflecting clinical focus over basic science.

data.title: Tiempo, familia y trabajo: la urdimbre de la vulnerabilidadde las mujeres en contextos rurales de México
data.sub_theme: rural women's vulnerability and poverty
data.summary: Ethnographic study of three rural Mexican households examining how women's vulnerability is shaped by time, family, and work dynamics in contexts of poverty.

data.title: Effects of a 12-weeks pelvic floor exercises program on sports performance of female athletes: An exploratory randomized clinical trial
data.sub_theme: pelvic floor dysfunction, female athletes, sport performance
data.summary: A 12-week app-based pelvic floor muscle training program in female athletes reduced perceived impact of pelvic floor dysfunction on quality of life, with biofeedback showing higher countermovement jump power compared to control.

data.title: Survey Study of a Division-I Women’s Cross-Country Team Reveals Limited Participation in Pre-Collegiate Strength Training: Is There an Opportunity to Improve Training Modalities and Health Outcomes?
data.journal: Journal of Orthopaedic Science and Research
data.sub_theme: bone stress injuries, strength training in youth
data.summary: Survey of 11 Division-I female cross-country athletes found only 36% participated in pre-collegiate strength training, highlighting an opportunity to reduce bone stress injuries through earlier resistance training implementation.

data.title: Bimetallic CuFe@TMDP Nanozyme with Controllable Laccase/Peroxidase-like Activities for Colorimetric Detection of o-Chlorophenol and Tetracycline
data.summary: This paper develops a bimetallic nanozyme for colorimetric detection of chemical pollutants using enzyme-like activities; not related to sports.

data.title: Reconfigurable Dual-Terminal WSe <sub>2</sub> /h-BN p-n Photodetectors for In-Sensor Red-Green-Blue Convolution and Motion Detection
data.summary: This paper develops a dual-terminal photodetector for in-sensor computing vision processing with applications in robotics and edge AI; not related to sports.

data.title: Host–Guest Doping Room-Temperature Phosphorescence Sensing Strategy for the Detection of Related Substances in Naproxen APls and in the Production of Dosage Forms
data.summary: This paper develops a host-guest doping room-temperature phosphorescence sensing strategy for detecting impurities in pharmaceutical APIs and dosage forms; not related to sports.

data.title: Determinan Cash Holding Perusahaan Sub Industri Perkebunan dan Tanaman Pangan di Indonesia
data.sub_theme: cash holding determinants in plantation sector
data.summary: Panel data regression analysis of cash holding determinants in Indonesian plantation and food crop companies, finding profitability is a significant driver.

data.title: Understanding Barriers and Motivators: Designing for Readers Who Struggle to Start or Complete Books
data.journal: Maryland Shared Open Access Repository (USMAI Consortium)
data.sub_theme: digital reading interface design, behavioral psychology
data.summary: Qualitative study of barriers to reading initiation and completion among adults, identifying distractions and decision fatigue as key obstacles to sustainable reading habits.

data.title: From Hamadan to Los Angeles; The Life and scientific legacy of Dr. Hooshang Ebrami from Shaping Iran’s Information Infrastructure and Founding Academic Librarianship to Cultural Activism in Immigration
data.sub_theme: library science history, academic librarianship, cultural activism
data.summary: Biographical and historical analysis of Hooshang Ebrami's foundational contributions to library science education and infrastructure in Iran and cultural work in the United States.

data.title: The problem of enforcing court judgments on jointly owned assets between the debtor and a third party in the Saudi enforcement system: A comparative study
data.sub_theme: enforcement law, joint asset ownership, comparative legal systems
data.summary: Comparative legal analysis of court judgment enforcement on jointly owned assets in Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Jordan, and UAE legal systems.

data.title: Athletic Pubalgia (Sports Hernia): Narrative Review of Pathophysiology, Diagnosis, and Management
data.sub_theme: athletic pubalgia, groin pain, core stability
data.summary: Narrative review synthesizes evidence on athletic pubalgia pathophysiology, diagnosis via MRI, and management strategies showing conservative treatment as first-line therapy with surgery offering superior outcomes for refractory cases.

data.title: pixelLOG: Logging of Online Gameplay for Cognitive Research
data.summary: Computer science framework (pixelLOG) for logging Minecraft gameplay to track cognitive processes in virtual environments; not related to sports.

data.title: Implementing generative artificial intelligence in precision oncology: safety, governance, and significance
data.sub_theme: generative AI in precision oncology, clinical implementation
data.summary: Reviews generative AI applications in precision oncology and proposes governance strategy based on retrieval-augmented generation and human-in-the-loop workflows for mutation interpretation, trial eligibility, and imaging analysis.

data.title: Ethical Chess v2.0
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: AI ethics framework
data.summary: Proposes Agape-Centered Ethics (ACE) framework for AI systems as homeostatic alignment engine prioritizing user coherence and systemic health over politeness.

data.title: A Review of the Process Control System in Aero-Composite Manufacturing Operations
data.sub_theme: Process control systems, aerospace manufacturing, AS9100
data.summary: Not a sports research paper; qualitative case study of process control systems and environmental monitoring in aerospace composite manufacturing.

data.title: Al in Direct Tax Administration: From Scrutiny to Smart Compliance
data.journal: INTERANTIONAL JOURNAL OF SCIENTIFIC RESEARCH IN ENGINEERING AND MANAGEMENT
data.sub_theme: AI in tax administration, risk-based compliance
data.summary: Not a sports research paper; examines AI and machine learning applications in direct tax administration and smart compliance frameworks.

data.title: Multi-stage image processing approach for 3D-CT based in- or at-line inspection of complex parts
data.sub_theme: 3D-CT image processing, industrial inspection, nondestructive testing
data.summary: Not a sports research paper; develops multi-stage image processing approaches for 3D-CT based in-line inspection of complex industrial parts.

data.title: Review and Analysis of Methods for Separating Plastic Micro-Particles from Pipe Systems, Taking into Account Efficiency and Automation Potential
data.summary: Review of liquid-solid separation methods for removing microplastics from pipe systems, covering physical, chemical, and biological techniques.

data.title: Integration of digital twins into transport management systems
data.journal: Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Transport
data.summary: Review of digital twin integration in transport management systems for predictive maintenance in automotive and autonomous vehicle applications.

data.title: Zero-freeness of a multivariate monomer-dimer-cycle polynomial on bounded-degree graphs
data.summary: Mathematical study of a multivariate graph polynomial for matchings and cycle structures on bounded-degree graphs using Fernández-Procacci convergence criterion.

data.title: Stripping singularities accelerates cycle expansions
data.summary: Mathematical framework using layered approximation schemes and dynamical systems theory to accelerate cycle expansions in non-hyperbolic systems.

data.title: Exact Closed-Form Solutions for Trigonometric Integral Series via Kyungu Formulas
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Mathematical work introducing Kyungu Formulas for exact closed-form solutions of trigonometric integral series using analytic continuation and Bernoulli polynomials.

data.title: CURRENT IT MARKET INSIGHTS FOR UKRAINIAN PROJECT MANAGERS
data.summary: Analysis of project management trends and competency shifts in Ukraine's IT sector under digitalization and wartime conditions.

data.title: (α,β)-Membrane Graphs: Cycle Balance and Coupling Decoupling as Independent Axes of Graph Organization
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Mathematical framework introducing a two-parameter family of graphs (α,β)-Membrane Graphs satisfying cycle balance and monotone decoupling constraints.

data.title: The LCA Responsibility Framework
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Framework clarifying responsibility boundaries in Life Cycle Assessment by explicitly articulating values and decision-maker roles separate from scientific analysis.

data.title: The LCA Responsibility Framework
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Framework clarifying responsibility boundaries in Life Cycle Assessment by explicitly articulating values and decision-maker roles separate from scientific analysis.

data.summary: Mathematical work introducing Kyungu Formulas for exact closed-form solutions of trigonometric integral series using analytic continuation and Bernoulli polynomials.

data.title: Progressive Failure Analysis of Wellbore Cement Sheaths in Salt Cavern Energy Storage Under Gas Injection–Production Cycles
data.sub_theme: phase-field modeling of wellbore failure
data.summary: A computational phase-field model simulates thermo-mechanical coupling and progressive failure in cement sheaths during salt cavern gas storage cycles, revealing depth-dependent failure patterns and informing operating pressure strategies.

data.title: Theory and practice of diagnostics and prevention of hidden failures in complex technical systems
data.journal: Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Transport
data.sub_theme: fault tree analysis for hidden failures in transport systems
data.summary: A framework using fault tree analysis is developed to diagnose and prevent hidden failures in complex technical systems like aircraft, establishing constraints on diagnostic resources and identifying emergent system properties.

data.title: Development of offensive tactical skills in volleyball
data.sub_theme: offensive tactical skills development through game-based training
data.summary: A 12-week pedagogical experiment demonstrates that game-based, situational, and video-feedback training significantly improves offensive tactical efficiency and attack success rates in college-age volleyball players compared to controls.

data.title: Metabolomic signatures of high-intensity and sprint interval exercise/training in humans: a systematic review
data.sub_theme: metabolomic changes during high-intensity interval and sprint training
data.summary: A systematic review of 20 studies reveals that high-intensity interval and sprint training produce strong metabolomic changes primarily in carbohydrate, lipid, and amino acid pathways, with energy substrate utilization as a central mechanism.

data.title: (α,β)-Membrane Graphs: Cycle Balance and Coupling Decoupling as Independent Axes of Graph Organization

data.sub_theme: graph theory and mathematical combinatorics
data.summary: A mathematical framework defines a two-parameter family of graphs satisfying cycle balance and decoupling constraints, establishing analytic foundations for network topology analysis without simulation-based null models.

data.title: The effects of exergaming on sleep quality: a systematic review and meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials
data.sub_theme: exergaming intervention effectiveness
data.summary: Meta-analysis of 11 RCTs (521 participants) found exergame interventions significantly improved sleep quality compared to no intervention (SMD −0.31), with greater benefits for older adults (60+) and longer interventions (8+ weeks).

data.title: Le problème de la démarcation
data.sub_theme: philosophy of science
data.summary: Philosophical essay examining the demarcation problem between science and non-science, reconciling normative and relativist epistemologies through Bachelardian phenomenotechnique.

data.title: Communicating Science in the Age of GenAI: Can Generative AI Support the Usage of Higher-Level Science Communication Strategies in Writing?
data.sub_theme: generative AI for science communication training
data.summary: Randomized controlled trial (N=78) evaluating whether generative AI feedback enhances science communication training; GenAI-supported texts showed significant improvements in narrative use and connecting science to everyday life.

data.title: Wide‐Range Adaptive Metal Oxide for Hydrogen Sulfide Detection From Earth to Space‐Like Environments
data.summary: This paper develops porous copper-doped tin oxide microspheres for hydrogen sulfide detection across ambient and space-like environmental conditions; not related to sports.

data.title: ANTENNA PERFORMANCE PREDICTION USING MACHINE LEARNING
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: antenna design optimization
data.summary: Machine learning model for predicting antenna performance parameters including gain, return loss, and radiation pattern in wireless communication systems.

data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: antenna design optimization
data.summary: Machine learning model for predicting antenna performance parameters including gain, return loss, and radiation pattern in wireless communication systems.

data.title: THE LEADERSHIP SKILL NO ONE TEACHES: HOW TO FAIL FORWARD
data.sub_theme: leadership, failure recovery, organizational culture
data.summary: Leadership framework identifying five failure patterns and three strategic reframes for organizational recovery and professional development.

data.title: Beyond AGI II: From Alignment to Resonance
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: AI alignment and resonance, human-AI interaction
data.summary: Proposes resonance framework for human-AI interaction as alternative to alignment-based approaches, reframing engineers as topological tuners of inference trajectories.

data.title: Trace Metal Contents of NIST 1634c and NIST 8505 Multi-Element Petroleum Reference Materials: Compilation of Published Data and New Results Evaluating Acid Digestion Procedures
data.sub_theme: Trace element analysis, petroleum reference materials
data.summary: Not a sports research paper; analyzes trace metal contents in petroleum reference materials using acid digestion methods and ICP-MS.

data.title: From Data to Decision: Predictive Modeling of Oil Prices Using AutoML and SHAP Analysis
data.journal: International Journal of Energy Economics and Policy
data.sub_theme: Oil price forecasting, AutoML, explainable AI
data.summary: Not a sports research paper; applies AutoML and SHAP-based explainable machine learning to forecast crude oil prices using financial and macroeconomic data.

data.title: Physical Activity Patterns and Brain Health: A Systematic Review About Weekend Warrior vs Regular Exercise on Neuropsychiatric Disorders
data.sub_theme: weekend warrior vs regular physical activity on neuropsychiatric outcomes
data.summary: Systematic review of 12 observational studies (614,882 participants) found both weekend warrior and regular physical activity patterns provide comparable neuroprotective benefits for depression, dementia, and Parkinson's disease.

data.title: Effectiveness of Virtual Reality-Based Active Exercise Interventions for Fibromyalgia: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis of Randomized Controlled Trials
data.sub_theme: virtual reality-based exercise for fibromyalgia
data.summary: Meta-analysis of 10 RCTs (203 patients) found active VR-based exercise interventions significantly reduced pain, fatigue, and symptom severity in fibromyalgia, with moderate improvements in depression and anxiety.

data.title: Показники швидкісних здібностей кваліфікованих спортсменок у регбі-7 на початку підготовчого періоду
data.sub_theme: speed abilities, female rugby sevens, physical preparedness
data.summary: Assessment of 30 female rugby sevens players found that sprint performance (50m, 10m, 20m, 40m splits) and vertical jump achieved 76-97% of world-class standards, with highest relative performance in 20-40m sprints (94-97%) compared to elite benchmarks.

data.title: Indicators of speed abilities of qualified female rugby sevens players at the beginning of the preparatory period
data.sub_theme: speed abilities, female rugby sevens, physical preparedness
data.summary: Assessment of 30 female rugby sevens players found that sprint performance (50m, 10m, 20m, 40m splits) and vertical jump achieved 76-97% of world-class standards, with highest relative performance in 20-40m sprints (94-97%) compared to elite benchmarks.

data.title: Highest oxygen consumption prediction by forced vital capacity in athletes
data.sub_theme: VO2max prediction, spirometry, field assessment
data.summary: LASSO regression on 422 athletes (cycling, swimming, triathlon, multisport) developed a practical VO2max prediction equation using forced vital capacity and gender (R²=0.690, SEE=0.65 L·min⁻¹), with sport-specific analysis showing highest accuracy in swimmers (R²=0.893).

data.title: In Silico Optimization of Ewingella americana Oncolytic Therapy: Mitigating Hepatic Clearance and Sepsis Risks via a pH-Sensitive "Stealth-Swarm" Liposomal Delivery System
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)

data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: This paper presents an in silico simulation study optimizing oncolytic bacterial therapy for cancer using digital twin modeling; not related to sports.

data.title: Psychological skills training as a strategy to improve mental health and reduce perceived stress in university athletes

data.title: Hip Surgical Treatment Registry (HipSTR): The North American Hip Arthroscopy Registry—Who We Are Operating on and What We Are Doing; Findings in Its Inaugural Year 2023 With >1000 Patients

data.sub_theme: pharmaceutical CMC deficiencies, ANDA review, regulatory approval
data.summary: Systematic review of chemical, manufacturing, and controls deficiencies in ANDA cycles (2020-2025), finding chemistry deficiencies account for 34% of total deficiencies and first-cycle approval rates remain low due to process understanding gaps.

data.title: Study on dynamic characteristics and structural optimization of mining vibrating separator
data.sub_theme: mining vibrating separator design, dynamic characteristics, particle swarm optimization
data.summary: Engineering study using finite element analysis and particle swarm optimization to improve mining vibrating separator design, achieving 13.6-12.9% peak stress reduction and 19.7-23.2% natural frequency increase without mass increase.

data.title: Advances in Cosmetic Science: A Comprehensive Review of Trends, Technologies, and Applications
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: cosmetic science, biotechnology, artificial intelligence in skincare
data.summary: Comprehensive review of contemporary trends in cosmetic science including biomimetic ingredients, nanocarrier delivery systems, AI-driven diagnostics, and green chemistry principles for sustainable innovation.

data.title: Integrating Digital Project Controls and Risk Mitigation Frameworks to Improve Decision-Making in Complex Civil Engineering Projects
data.journal: International Journal of Innovative Science and Research Technology (IJISRT)
data.sub_theme: digital project controls, risk mitigation, civil engineering project management
data.summary: Study integrating digital project controls with risk mitigation frameworks in complex civil engineering projects, demonstrating improved Cost Performance Index, Schedule Performance Index, and early-warning capabilities through real-time analytics.

data.title: Economic Efficiency of Automated Web Accessibility Testing for Reducing IT Enterprises' Operating Costs
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Study examines economic efficiency of automating web accessibility testing for IT enterprises to reduce operating costs and improve quality assurance processes.

data.title: CMC Deficiency Patterns in ANDA Review: A Systematic Review of Regulatory Expectations in Healthcare
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Systematic review of chemical, manufacturing, and controls (CMC) deficiencies in pharmaceutical ANDA cycles identifies root causes and regulatory drivers of approval efficiency.

data.title: Macro-Financial Blind Spots in Emerging Markets: Non-Bank Intermediation, Funding Liquidity, and the Persistence of Global Shock Transmission
data.summary: Macroeconomic analysis of financial vulnerability in emerging markets examines non-bank intermediation, funding liquidity, and global shock transmission through financial systems.

data.title: The Interactional Accomplishment of Refereeing Decisions in VAR Protocols
data.journal: Journal of Sport and Social Issues
data.sub_theme: VAR decision-making, referee protocol, video technology
data.summary: An ethnomethodological analysis of 107 VAR review recordings from Turkish Premier League matches revealed that despite shared video evidence, referees and VARs interpret incidents differently due to divergent professional vision and epistemic stances, challenging assumptions about video technology objectivity.

data.title: Effects of exercise interventions on memory in depression: a three-level meta-analysis
data.sub_theme: exercise effects on memory in depression
data.summary: Three-level meta-analysis of 16 RCTs found that low-to-moderate intensity, short-duration (≤12 weeks) mind-body exercise produces small but significant improvements in verbal memory in depressed patients.

data.title: A network meta-analysis of interventions for anxiety and depression in PCOS
data.sub_theme: interventions for anxiety and depression in PCOS
data.summary: Network meta-analysis of 25 RCTs in 1,453 female PCOS patients identified emotion-focused therapy and peer support as most effective for alleviating anxiety and depression, with exercise showing moderate benefit.

data.title: The Untapped Potential of Expert Elicitation in Sports Medicine Epidemiology
data.sub_theme: expert elicitation in epidemiology
data.summary: This commentary introduces expert elicitation (SHELF framework) as a structured methodology to formalize clinical judgment into quantitative priors for Bayesian analyses in sports medicine epidemiology, particularly for small cohorts, rare events, and underpowered trials.

data.title: The musculoskeletal health of retired elite women footballers
data.sub_theme: musculoskeletal injuries in retired elite women footballers
data.summary: Retired elite women footballers commonly experience musculoskeletal complaints, particularly knee-related issues linked to severe injuries sustained during their playing careers.

data.title: Targeting Stress Mindset and Irrational Beliefs to Improve Performance and Reduce Anxiety and Depression Symptoms in Academy Athletes
data.sub_theme: stress mindset, cognitive behavioral intervention, anxiety, depression
data.summary: A 6-session multimodal cognitive behavioral intervention in football and rugby academy athletes (n=67) significantly increased stress mindset and self-compassion while reducing irrational beliefs, anxiety, and depression symptoms with small effect sizes.

data.title: Training adolescent female athletes: Supports, barriers and practical coaching considerations
data.sub_theme: female adolescent athlete development, strength and conditioning coaching
data.summary: Review article presents a coaching framework for adolescent female athletes that considers physiological development, environmental factors, and holistic coaching delivery to support continuation and success in sport at all levels.

data.title: Multifocal transcranial direct current stimulation enhances lower limb jump performance and neuromuscular adaptation in female collegiate basketball players
data.sub_theme: transcranial direct current stimulation, jump performance, neuromuscular adaptation
data.summary: Multifocal anodal tDCS at 4 mA significantly enhanced jump height, concentric impulse, relative peak force and power, and reactive strength index in female collegiate basketball players, without altering lower limb EMG activation patterns.

data.title: Evaluating training load self-monitoring in female soccer players: Estimating GPS-derived parameters
data.journal: International Journal of Sports Science & Coaching
data.sub_theme: training load monitoring, GPS-derived metrics, self-monitoring, external workload
data.summary: Female semi-professional soccer players consistently underestimated distance covered during training, but regular session-by-session GPS feedback significantly improved their distance estimation accuracy compared to sporadic feedback.

data.title: Ultrasensitive Hydrogen Detection via Layered n-Type Polymer Chemiresistors
data.summary: Paper develops n-type polymer chemiresistors for ultrasensitive hydrogen gas leak detection; not related to sports.

data.title: Artificial intelligence and human-in-loop: a complementary approach to workplace coaching

data.sub_theme: AI-human integration in workplace coaching
data.summary: Literature review proposes an AI-Human-in-Loop framework for workplace coaching, highlighting how combining human expertise with AI analytics can optimize learning outcomes while maintaining human decision-making.

data.title: "Corporate Governance Mechanisms and Financial Performance: A Comparative Study of Public and Private Sector Banks in India"

data.summary: Comparative regression analysis of corporate governance mechanisms (board independence, gender diversity, CEO duality) and financial performance across Indian public and private sector banks 2019–2023.

data.summary: Systematic review of 24 studies on running reveals that exercise-induced fatigue consistently alters lower-limb biomechanics, increasing ground contact time, reducing ankle power, and elevating injury-relevant impact loading.

data.title: Tennis in the heat: a panel discussion
data.journal: South African Journal of Sports Medicine

data.title: Heavy menstrual bleeding and iron-deficiency anemia in physically active women
