data.sub_theme: European research infrastructure policy
data.summary: Position statement on European Commission consultation regarding the European Research Area Act and open science principles; not related to sport.

data.title: S07-1: Promoting Physical Literacy in Higher Education Physical Education: ePhyLi
data.journal: Baltic Journal of Sport and Health Sciences
data.sub_theme: physical literacy in physical education teacher training
data.summary: ePhyLi Erasmus+ project developed digital tools (e-book, serious game, e-platform) to enhance physical literacy understanding among PE teacher students across four European countries, currently in second pilot phase with evaluation of effectiveness and usability.

data.title: How the Service Provider Influences the Continuation of Physical Activity for People With Hip and Knee Osteoarthritis
data.journal: Baltic Journal of Sport and Health Sciences
data.sub_theme: physical activity maintenance in hip and knee osteoarthritis
data.summary: Systematic review of qualitative studies on physical activity maintenance in hip and knee osteoarthritis identified therapeutic alliance, ongoing support, and collaborative goal-setting as key factors influencing continued activity adherence post-intervention.

data.title: Refusal-First Governance Science (RFG-Ω): Temporal Admissibility Under Irreversibility
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: governance science framework
data.summary: Theoretical framework for governance science addressing structural timing of refusal in irreversible systems; not related to sport.

data.title: The health economics of social prescribing: systematic review of the international evidence
data.sub_theme: social prescribing health economics
data.summary: Systematic review of 18 international studies on health economic evaluation of social prescribing initiatives including exercise programs, finding limited use of standard economic methods and positive SROI returns for mental health interventions.

data.title: Effects of Exercise Training on Cardiometabolic Factors in Obese Children and Adolescents with Metabolic Syndrome: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis
data.journal: Iranian journal of diabetes and metabolism
data.sub_theme: exercise metabolic syndrome children
data.summary: Meta-analysis of 6 studies on 1,761 obese children with metabolic syndrome showing exercise training significantly reduced body weight, waist circumference, LDL, triglycerides, and fasting glucose/insulin.

data.title: The Brain on the Run: Preliminary Longitudinal Findings on Benefits of Mood and Brain After Regular Running
data.journal: Baltic Journal of Sport and Health Sciences
data.sub_theme: running mood hippocampus brain structure
data.summary: Longitudinal intervention study with 129 sedentary young adults comparing individual vs. group-based running over 4 weeks, examining structural brain changes (hippocampus), mood, and fitness with MRI and psychometric measures.

data.title: S16-2: Understanding Physical Activity Provision in Mental Health Services in Ireland
data.journal: Baltic Journal of Sport and Health Sciences
data.sub_theme: physical activity mental health services
data.summary: Mixed-methods study in Ireland describing physical activity provision in mental health services via national survey (n=45) and case study of integrated exercise practitioners, finding 90% offer some programs but only 25% meet service user needs.

data.title: Effectiveness of a 28-Day Digital Physical Activity Intervention on Physical Fitness and Behaviour Change in Sedentary Women: A 6-Month Follow-Up Study
data.journal: Baltic Journal of Sport and Health Sciences
data.sub_theme: digital physical activity behavior change sedentary women
data.summary: Study of 21 sedentary middle-aged women in a 28-day mobile physical activity program with 6-month follow-up showing significant improvements in squat, agility, and handgrip strength, with 90% remaining physically active at follow-up.

data.title: The Effect of Deep Tissue Massage on Lactate Clearance Kinetic and Muscle Strength Recovery
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: lactate clearance, deep tissue massage, recovery
data.summary: Deep tissue massage accelerated blood lactate clearance during early post-exercise recovery and improved muscle strength restoration within 10-30 minutes compared to passive rest.

data.title: Five-Stage Model of Sports Rehabilitation: Adaptation for Basketball
data.journal: Scientific Journal of National Pedagogical Dragomanov University Series 15 Scientific and pedagogical problems of physical culture (physical culture and sports)
data.sub_theme: musculoskeletal injury rehabilitation, five-stage model
data.summary: A five-stage sports rehabilitation model tailored to basketball's biomechanical demands was proposed, progressing from acute pain management through functional strength, sports-specific integration, and return-to-play assessment with emphasis on lower limb stabilizers and proprioception.

data.title: ASSESSING THE IMPLEMENTATION OF A SELF-REFERRAL ACUTE MUSCULOSKELETAL INJURY CLINIC: EXPERIENCE IN A TERTIARY, RURAL PRACTICE
data.sub_theme: acute musculoskeletal injury incidence, rural clinic implementation
data.summary: A rural self-referral acute injury clinic assessed 945 patients over 22 months, with 84.7% receiving acute injury diagnoses within 10 days of injury, with snow sports being the most common injury activity (29%), demonstrating feasibility of rapid tertiary care access.

data.title: The Effect of Deep Tissue Massage on Lactate Clearance Kinetic and Muscle Strength Recovery
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: lactate clearance, deep tissue massage, recovery
data.summary: Deep tissue massage accelerated blood lactate clearance during early post-exercise recovery and improved muscle strength restoration within 10-30 minutes compared to passive rest.

data.title: S02-1: Online Consultation Guidelines ‘Bewust Bewegen’ With Chronic Diseases
data.journal: Baltic Journal of Sport and Health Sciences
data.sub_theme: physical activity promotion, chronic disease management guidelines
data.summary: Online consultation guidelines 'Bewust Bewegen' were developed and implemented to support healthcare professionals in providing brief evidence-based physical activity advice to patients with chronic diseases, with 555 professionals registered and average satisfaction rating of 7.8/10.

data.title: COST OF ORTHOPAEDIC SPORTS MEDICINE PROCEDURES IN AN AMBULATORY SURGICAL CENTRE COMPARED TO A HOSPITAL OUTPATIENT DEPARTMENT
data.sub_theme: surgical procedure costs, ambulatory vs hospital settings
data.summary: Ambulatory surgery centers (ASC) demonstrated significantly lower total costs for hip arthroscopy ($3,543 vs $6,209), rotator cuff repair, and ACL reconstruction with shorter operative times compared to hospital outpatient departments in a publicly funded healthcare model.

data.title: General and sports nutrition knowledge among nutritionists in Jordan
data.sub_theme: sports nutrition knowledge, nutritionists
data.summary: Cross-sectional survey of 394 Jordanian nutritionists revealed 39.6% had poor sports nutrition knowledge, with deficits associated with gender, BMI, education level, experience, and lack of regular exercise.

data.title: Sex-Specific Associations Between Repetitive Head Impact Exposure and Cerebral Blood Flow Among Active Amateur Soccer Players
data.sub_theme: repetitive head impacts, cerebral blood flow, sex differences, soccer
data.summary: MRI study of 82 amateur soccer players (48.9% female) found athletes with repetitive head impact exposure had higher cerebral blood flow globally and in sex-specific brain regions, with associations to neuropsychological outcomes.

data.title: The Role of Social Support and Perfectionist Climate in the Development of Sports Persistence
data.sub_theme: sports persistence, social support, perfectionist climate, youth athletes
data.summary: Cross-sectional study of 1,105 young athletes (14-25 years) found parental and teacher support positively predicted sports persistence, while peer support had no effect; perfectionist expectations helped but criticism harmed persistence, with gender-mediated effects.

data.title: Time-to-Injury Forecasting in Elite Female Football: A DeepHit Survival Approach
data.sub_theme: time-to-injury forecasting, survival modeling, elite female footballers
data.summary: DeepHit neural network applied to longitudinal athlete monitoring data from elite female footballers achieved concordance index of 0.762, outperforming baseline models and providing interpretable, time-varying injury risk estimates.

data.title: Whistles, Words, and Willpower: How Coach Etiquette Relates to Intrinsic and Extrinsic Sport Motivation among Collegiate Softball And Baseball Athletes
data.sub_theme: coach etiquette, athlete motivation, collegiate softball and baseball
data.summary: Survey of 45 collegiate softball and baseball athletes found perceived coach etiquette did not significantly predict intrinsic or extrinsic motivation, though coaches' etiquette was moderately perceived as respectful.

data.summary: Development of UV photodetector devices using gallium oxide heterostructures for fast response applications; not related to sports.

data.summary: Synthesis and characterization of lanthanide-organic metal complexes for temperature sensing and ion detection applications; not related to sports.

data.summary: Development of cerium-doped halide perovskite scintillators for high-speed X-ray medical imaging; not related to sports.

data.title: Fluorescence quenching of nanoemitters within metallic nanoholes
data.summary: Numerical and experimental analysis of fluorescence quenching dynamics in metallic nanoholes for biosensing applications; not related to sports.

data.title: Near-Infrared Photonic Metal–Organic Frameworks
data.summary: Review of near-infrared photonic metal-organic frameworks for military, medical, and optical communication applications; not related to sports.

data.summary: Novel ferroelectric biosensor for detection of cancer cells and viral pathogens using tunnel field-effect transistor technology; not related to sports.

data.title: Optimization of Cu-Doped ZnO Nanomaterials for Ultrasensitive Detection of Trace Formaldehyde under Room Temperature and UV Light Activation
data.summary: Synthesis and optimization of Cu-doped ZnO nanomaterials for trace formaldehyde gas sensing with DFT calculations; not related to sports.

data.title: Building First-Line Leadership in Contract Research Organizations: Senior Leaders’ Perspectives on Critical Transition Competencies
data.journal: International Journal of Current Science Research and Review
data.sub_theme: First-line leadership transition competencies in clinical research
data.summary: Thematic analysis of senior leaders identifies six critical competency domains for individual contributors transitioning to first-line manager roles in clinical research organizations.

data.title: Predictive Analytics for Educational Equity: A Machine Learning Approach to Identifying Learning Gaps in Low-Resource Schools

data.summary: An experimental training program based on tactical situations significantly improved perceptual-motor capabilities and offensive positioning in young football players compared to controls, as measured by video and GPS analysis.

data.title: Thermal Stratification in Solar Storage Tanks: Long-Term Modelling and Efficiency Analysis
data.sub_theme: thermal modeling
data.summary: Multi-node solar thermal storage tank model simulates temperature stratification effects on domestic hot water system efficiency across annual cycles in Polish climate.

data.title: THE SIGNIFICANCE OF LIQUIDITY, PROFITABILITY, AND SOLVENCY RATIOS ON FINANCIAL STABILITY: A SYSTEMATIC LITERATURE REVIEW
data.journal: HEI EMA Jurnal Riset Hukum Ekonomi Islam Ekonomi Manajemen dan Akuntansi
data.sub_theme: financial ratio analysis
data.summary: Systematic literature review examines the role of liquidity, profitability, and solvency ratios in assessing corporate financial stability from 2013–2023.

data.title: Clinical Ethicists and Medical Assistance in Dying (MAiD): Possible Roles and Challenges
data.sub_theme: medical ethics, assisted dying
data.summary: Qualitative analysis of clinical ethicists' roles in medical assistance in dying policy and practice in Canadian healthcare institutions.

data.title: Changes in Water Quality and Plankton of Artificial Culture Pond in Sea Cucumber Apostichopus japonicus
data.sub_theme: aquaculture, sea cucumber cultivation
data.summary: Descriptive study monitors seasonal changes in water quality and plankton composition in sea cucumber aquaculture ponds from June to November.

data.sub_theme: interactive digital vinyl system, DJ equipment, music technology
data.summary: This technical evaluation of a digital vinyl system (IDVS+) for DJ music control is not related to sports and appears to be a false positive from keyword search.

data.sub_theme: teacher wellbeing, quality of life assessment
data.summary: Descriptive study of effective daily life among guidance and counseling teachers in Indonesian high schools using Likert-scale survey (n=86), finding 80.28% in very good category.

data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)

data.summary: Speculative physics paper proposing non-standard explanations for interstellar object 3I/ATLAS hydrogen emissions and trajectory anomalies using ArXe-Resonance Kinematics framework.

data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)

data.summary: Speculative physics paper proposing non-standard explanations for interstellar object 3I/ATLAS hydrogen emissions and trajectory anomalies using ArXe-Resonance Kinematics framework.

data.title: Navigating Faculty Coaching: A Framework of Key Considerations
data.sub_theme: faculty development, workplace coaching programs
data.summary: Framework and guidance document for designing and implementing faculty coaching programs in academic medicine settings, addressing stakeholder considerations and program outcomes.

data.title: Engineering interventions in automotive maintenance, repair and operations (MRO)
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: predictive maintenance analytics for automotive equipment
data.summary: Retrospective big data analysis of 350 equipment units over 15 years demonstrates that linear mileage-based maintenance fails under continuous operation; Chuikov Adaptive Maintenance Framework incorporating tribodiagnostics, vibroacoustic monitoring, and oil analysis reduces Total Cost of Ownership.

data.title: Microanalysis of Hornblende for Fluorine and Chlorine: Impact of Analytical Parameters on Accuracy and Detection Limits
data.sub_theme: electron probe microanalysis of geological samples
data.summary: Study optimizes electron probe microanalysis parameters for accurate determination of fluorine and chlorine in hornblende minerals, establishing single-current methods for geological applications.

data.title: Manajemen Pendidikan Karakter Religius Berbasis PAI: Temuan Kualitatif dari FGD Stakeholder Sekolah Dasar Islam
data.journal: Journal of Social Humanities and Education
data.sub_theme: religious character education management in Islamic schools
data.summary: Qualitative case study of focus group discussions with school stakeholders reveals that religious character education is sustained primarily by symbolic conformity rather than organizational learning.

data.title: Digital Transformation in Airline Logistics: A Data-Driven Approach to Enhancing Cost Efficiency and Operational Performance
data.sub_theme: digital transformation in airline logistics
data.summary: Mixed-methods study combining literature review and case studies demonstrates that AI-driven predictive analytics, IoT tracking, and blockchain technology reduce operational costs and delay expenses in airline logistics.

data.title: DEVELOPMENT OF AN INFORMATION SYSTEM FOR MODELING AND ANALYZING HYDROMETALLURGICAL PROCESSING OF MOLYBDENITE CONCENTRATES
data.journal: Bulletin of Shakarim University Technical Sciences
data.sub_theme: hydrometallurgical processing information system
data.summary: Development of a Django-based information system for modeling molybdenite concentrate hydrometallurgical processing enables prediction of recovery rates and creates a digital twin for industrial scaling without additional experiments.

data.title: Engineering interventions in automotive maintenance, repair and operations (MRO)
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: predictive maintenance in automotive equipment
data.summary: Retrospective analysis of 15-year operational data from 350 units demonstrates failure of linear mileage-based maintenance and proposes the Chuikov Adaptive Maintenance Framework using tribodiagnostics and vibroacoustic monitoring to manage machinery degradation.

data.title: When One Life Becomes Humanity — Moral Amplification, Responsibility, and the Conditions of Freedom
data.sub_theme: moral philosophy and social safety
data.summary: Philosophical essay arguing that non-negotiable safety is a foundational constitutional requirement for social existence, using moral amplification as a boundary mechanism to prevent sacrificial reasoning in complex systems.

data.title: IMPLICATION OF ACTIVE VIDEO GAMES IN THE TREATMENT AND PREVENTION OF OVERWEIGHT AND OBESITY IN THE PAEDIATRIC POPULATION
data.journal: International Journal of Innovative Technologies in Social Science
data.sub_theme: active video games for pediatric obesity prevention
data.summary: Systematic review of 7 studies shows active video games improve BMI and body composition in overweight/obese children, with most consistent benefits when integrated into structured, multicomponent exercise programs combining exergaming with traditional exercise.

data.title: Paul Goma: literatura ca justiție simbolică. Trauma maternă și proiecția ei asupra personajelor feminine
data.sub_theme: literary analysis of trauma and female representation in Paul Goma's work
data.summary: A literary analysis examines how Paul Goma's adolescent trauma shaped his representations of female characters across his 'Cycle of Women' novels, using literature as symbolic justice for women's experiences under authoritarian regimes.

data.title: The influence of sex on shoulder and hip joint resting position and mobility in elite golfers
data.sub_theme: sex-based differences in shoulder and hip joint position, mobility, and clubhead velocity
data.summary: In 24 elite golfers (12 male, 12 female), hip joint range of motion showed opposite correlations with clubhead velocity between sexes (r=0.71 for males, r=-0.58 for females), and males demonstrated greater left hip internal rotation, indicating sex-specific skeletal adaptations requiring tailored conditioning protocols.

data.title: Prevalence of depression and anxiety symptoms among elite female beach volleyball players in the FIVB top 200
data.sub_theme: depression and anxiety symptoms in elite female beach volleyball players
data.summary: A cross-sectional study of 52 elite female beach volleyball players in the FIVB top 200 found that 67.3% exceeded clinical thresholds for trait anxiety and 71.2% for depressive symptoms, with poor team communication and financial insecurity as significant predictors.

data.title: Influence of nutrition pattern on exercise performance, inflammation and muscle damage biomarkers in a non-athlete healthy young cohort
data.sub_theme: dietary patterns, exercise-induced inflammation, and muscle damage biomarkers
data.summary: In 78 recreationally active (non-athlete) young adults, nutrient-rich dietary patterns enhanced exercise performance through muscle mass accrual, while exercise volume influenced early systemic inflammation independently of muscle damage markers.

data.title: A Multitarget Screening Method for the Detection of Small Peptides in Dried Blood Spots for Doping Control Analysis
data.sub_theme: doping control analysis, dried blood spots
data.summary: Development and validation of a liquid chromatography-mass spectrometry screening method for detecting small peptides in dried blood spots for anti-doping control in sports.

data.title: Hair Cortisol as a Biomarker of Chronic Stress in Community-Dwelling Adults With Longstanding Multiple Sclerosis
data.summary: Hair cortisol collection is feasible in community-dwelling adults with longstanding multiple sclerosis, though cortisol showed no significant correlation with self-reported stress measures.

data.title: Pengaruh Current Ratio, Return on Asset, dan Net Profit Margin terhadap Debt to Equity Ratio pada PT Unilever Indonesia Tbk Periode 2015-2024
data.journal: Jurnal Alwatzikhoebillah Kajian Islam Pendidikan Ekonomi Humaniora
data.summary: Multiple linear regression of 40 quarterly observations from PT Unilever Indonesia found Current Ratio and Net Profit Margin negatively affect Debt-to-Equity Ratio, but ROA does not.

data.title: All BANG, little buck: Need-related experiences are weakly linked with behavior in the video game domain
data.sub_theme: motivation-behavior gap, self-determination theory
data.summary: Analysis of 11k daily observations and 102k sessions from video game players found weak or null associations between need satisfaction (autonomy, competence, relatedness) and subsequent gaming behavior despite robust links to subjective motivational states.

data.title: PENGARUH PROFITABILITAS, LIKUIDITAS TERHADAP STRUKTUR MODAL PERUSAHAAN FOOD AND BEVERAGE YANG TERDAFTAR DI BURSA EFEK INDONESIA
data.summary: Multiple linear regression of 22 food and beverage companies found Current Ratio negatively affects Debt-to-Equity Ratio while ROE showed no significant effect on capital structure.

data.title: Does Sharia governance deter bank risk-taking? Evidence from profit-sharing accounts and board financial expertise
data.summary: Generalized least squares analysis of 37 Islamic banks across five GCC countries found Sharia board accounting/finance qualifications and profit-sharing accounts significantly reduce liquidity and credit risks.

data.title: The Effect of Current Ratio on Return on Assets in Consumer Goods Companies Listed on the Indonesia Stock Exchange
data.journal: Golden Ratio of Data in Summary
data.summary: Simple linear regression of 45 Indonesian consumer goods companies found Current Ratio has weak negative non-significant relationship with Return on Assets over 2018–2022.

data.title: The ALDH4A1/anti-ALDH4A1 axis as a novel player of atherosclerosis in rheumatoid arthritis
data.sub_theme: rheumatoid arthritis, cardiovascular risk, atherosclerosis
data.summary: This clinical research paper on ALDH4A1 and atherosclerosis in rheumatoid arthritis is a medical study unrelated to sports and appears to be a false positive from keyword search.

data.title: Drivers and barriers of successful short-term dietary behavior change: Transferable factors from a qualitative case study of Ramadan fasting
data.sub_theme: dietary behavior change during Ramadan fasting
data.summary: Qualitative study of 23 adults identifies drivers of successful short-term dietary behavior change during Ramadan fasting, revealing religious obligation and social support as primary drivers, with capability and habit formation as transferable factors.

data.title: ANALISIS SWOT PT. ALCYFA FAMILY GROUP GUNA MENINGKATKAN PENJUALAN
data.sub_theme: SWOT analysis for marketing strategy
data.summary: Descriptive SWOT analysis of PT ALCYFA FAMILY GROUP develops integrated online and offline marketing strategies to improve sales and market positioning in competitive business environment.

data.title: Self-assembling dendrimer nanoparticles in cancer therapy
data.sub_theme: dendrimer nanoparticles, drug delivery systems
data.summary: Review of self-assembling dendrimer nanoparticles for cancer therapy applications, covering synthesis, drug delivery mechanisms, and clinical translation.

data.title: Leveraging AI for Lowering Patient Financial Responsibility in the USA Healthcare<u> </u>
data.journal: International Journal of Global Innovations and Solutions (IJGIS)
data.sub_theme: AI applications in healthcare cost reduction
data.summary: Narrative review of AI and machine learning applications in U.S. healthcare demonstrates potential for significant cost reduction through administrative efficiency, billing optimization, revenue cycle management, and predictive analytics.

data.title: GOVERNANCE-DRIVEN SMART CITY ENERGY MANAGEMENT EMPLOYING BIO-INSPIRED QUANTUM FIREFLY–PARTICLE SWARM OPTIMIZATION FOR WIRELESS SENSOR NETWORKS AND RELIABLE PUBLIC SERVICES
data.journal: Lex localis - Journal of Local Self-Government
data.sub_theme: smart city energy optimization and sensor networks
data.summary: Bio-inspired quantum firefly-particle swarm optimization algorithm for smart city wireless sensor networks achieved 29-42% energy savings, 23-36% latency reduction, and 33% extension in network lifetime compared to conventional algorithms.

data.title: Footprints of Resilience among High School Students Living in Farming Communities: An Integrative Framework
data.journal: Journal of Education Society and Behavioural Science
data.sub_theme: student resilience in rural farming communities
data.summary: Straussian grounded theory analysis of 12 students, 11 teachers, and 12 parents in a Philippine farming community generated the Footprints of Resilience theory explaining how structural, social, and personal factors shape student persistence despite resource-constrained foot commuting to school.

data.title: A Review on the Trophic Shifts Among Habitat Types of the Red Fox (Vulpes vulpes Linnaeus) and Insights on Its Role as Bioindicator in Mediterranean Landscapes
data.sub_theme: red fox diet and trophic ecology in Mediterranean habitats
data.summary: Systematic review of 12 studies on red fox diet across Mediterranean forests, scrublands, and agroecosystems reveals pronounced dietary plasticity with invertebrates and fruits predominant, supporting the red fox's potential as a functional bioindicator.

data.title: Evaluation of Preventive Maintenance in Rolling Mill Company Using Statistical Analysis
data.journal: Journal on Electronic and Automation Engineering
data.sub_theme: preventive maintenance planning using DEMATEL
data.summary: Decision-Making Trial and Evaluation Laboratory (DEMATEL) analysis of rolling mill preventive maintenance identified critical cause-effect relationships among equipment factors, resulting in improved reliability, reduced unplanned downtime, and optimized maintenance costs.

data.title: Transforming the UK ESG Finance Architecture for Productivity-Led Economic Growth
data.journal: World Journal of Advanced Research and Reviews
data.sub_theme: ESG finance and productivity
data.summary: Panel data analysis of 487 UK-listed firms (2015-2024) using fixed-effects regression reveals that firms in top ESG performance quartile demonstrate 12.3% higher total factor productivity and 8.7% superior labour productivity compared to bottom quartile.

data.title: Effort and its perception revisited: How physical-domain insights could lead toward a unified theory
data.sub_theme: effort perception theory
data.summary: Multidisciplinary review proposing a transdisciplinary definition of effort and refined theoretical models for understanding effort perception across physical and cognitive domains, emphasizing self-report measures over physiological variables.

data.title: Effects of Exercise-Based Telerehabilitation for Knee Osteoarthritis: A Systematic Review and a Study Protocol
data.sub_theme: telerehabilitation for knee osteoarthritis
data.summary: Systematic review of 10 studies (1354 participants) shows telerehabilitation for knee osteoarthritis provides significant pain relief and improves physical function, with effectiveness comparable or superior to traditional rehabilitation, though evidence remains mixed.

data.title: “We’re Putting All Our Eggs in the Gender Basket”: Examining the Absence of Intersectionality Within Community Sport Gender Equity
data.journal: Journal of Sport and Social Issues
data.sub_theme: intersectionality in community sport gender equity
data.summary: Feminist intersectional analysis of 13 Australian local government employees and 42 sports club volunteers reveals most community sports clubs and local government lack understanding of intersectionality and employ siloed approaches to gender equity that fail to address multiple forms of oppression beyond gender.

data.title: Research Report: Friendship Patterns of Women
data.journal: The Journal of Psychodrama Sociometry and Group Psychotherapy
data.sub_theme: friendship patterns and social structures in women's relationships
data.summary: A research report reviewing sociometric and psychological studies examined age-related differences in women's same-sex friendships, investigating criteria, functions, and maintenance concerns across younger (20-39) and older (50-69) age groups.

data.title: Identifying individual playing roles in professional and semi-professional male and female basketball players. A systematic review
data.sub_theme: individual playing roles identification in professional and semi-professional players
data.summary: A systematic review of 12 studies on basketball individual playing roles found methodological heterogeneity across studies and identified seven recurrent playing roles (paint protector, shooter, role player, floor general, defensive player, versatile player, explosive player), emphasizing the need for standardized frameworks.

data.title: Sex and performance‐level differences in aerobic and haematological parameters among elite ski mountaineering athletes
data.sub_theme: aerobic and haematological parameters in elite ski mountaineers
data.summary: In 29 elite ski mountaineering athletes, hemoglobin mass normalized to body mass strongly correlated with VO2max in both sexes, but elite Tier 5 athletes achieved superior aerobic performance without higher hemoglobin mass, suggesting additional physiological factors drive elite performance.

data.title: Force-Sensor-Based Analysis of the Effects of a Six-Week Plyometric Training Program on the Speed, Strength, and Balance Ability on Hard and Soft Surfaces of Adolescent Female Basketball Players
data.sub_theme: plyometric training on soft versus hard surfaces for explosive power and balance
data.summary: A randomized controlled trial of 42 adolescent female basketball players found that six weeks of plyometric training on soft (unstable) surfaces produced greater improvements in vertical jump, dynamic balance, and static balance compared to hard-surface or conventional training.

data.title: Rethinking Energy Availability from Conceptual Models to Applied Practice: A Narrative Review

data.summary: A narrative review synthesizes the evolution of energy availability concepts and evidence that low energy availability impairs hormonal function, bone health, and recovery, while highlighting methodological challenges in assessment and the utility of screening questionnaires and biomarkers.

data.title: Fabrication and Performance of Ga <sub>2</sub> O <sub>3</sub> /CuAlO <sub>2</sub> Heterojunction Solar-Blind UV Detectors via Sol-Gel Process
data.summary: Paper on UV detector fabrication using gallium oxide heterojunctions; not related to sports.

data.title: Spatially resolved lipids in a mouse brain model of globoid cell leukodystrophy via IR-MALDESI MSI and parallel reaction monitoring MSI
data.summary: Paper on mass spectrometry imaging for studying lipid distribution in a mouse brain disease model; not related to sports.

data.title: Synthesis of Nitrogen-doped Carbon Quantum Dots from Mangifera Indica Leaves for Fluorescent Forensic Sensing
data.summary: Paper on synthesis of carbon quantum dots for forensic detection of toxins and heavy metals; not related to sports.

data.title: Expansive Thought Dynamics Support Emotional Recovery
data.sub_theme: emotional recovery, thought dynamics, mood induction
data.summary: Two-study experimental investigation (N=759 and N=233) showing that expansive thought dynamics—characterized by broader conceptual movement—predict greater emotional recovery from negative mood states through transitions into emotionally neutral states.

data.title: The influence of digital transformation on chinese bank profitability performance
data.summary: Regression analysis of 116 Chinese commercial banks (2011–2023) showing digital transformation reduces profitability performance through mediating pathways of operational efficiency and non-performing loan ratios.

data.title: MicroRNA-146a protects against hepatocellular carcinoma through suppression of CCL5
data.summary: MicroRNA-146a suppresses hepatocellular carcinoma risk through CCL5-dependent regulation of immune dysfunction in a mouse model, with female mice showing increased sensitivity.

data.title: THE EFFECT OF FINANCING DECISIONS ON FIRM PERFORMANCE IN THE NIGERIAN INDUSTRIAL GOODS INDUSTRY
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Generalized Method of Moments analysis of 13 Nigerian industrial goods firms found that debt-to-assets and dividend-to-debt ratios significantly impact return on assets.

data.title: THE EFFECT OF FINANCING DECISIONS ON FIRM PERFORMANCE IN THE NIGERIAN INDUSTRIAL GOODS INDUSTRY
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Generalized Method of Moments analysis of 13 Nigerian industrial goods firms found that debt-to-assets and dividend-to-debt ratios significantly impact return on assets.

data.title: When Is a Sandplay Psychotherapy Process Completed?
data.journal: The Journal of Psychodrama Sociometry and Group Psychotherapy
data.summary: Survey of sandplay psychotherapists identified features of completed therapy processes, characterized as psychic journeys involving confrontation of internal conflict and return to collective Self.

data.title: Personality Factors Relating to Dishonest AI Use in Higher Education
data.journal: Murray State's Digital Commons (Murray State University)
data.sub_theme: academic dishonesty and AI use
data.summary: Study examines personality factors (self-efficacy, goal orientation, fear of failure) correlating with dishonest use of AI tools in higher education through correlational survey analysis.

data.title: Pengaruh Gaya Kepemimpinan Terhadap Kinerja Karyawan Pada Perusahaan Tambang di Kalimantan Timur
data.journal: Jurnal Ilmiah Manajemen Ekonomi dan Akuntansi
data.sub_theme: leadership and employee performance
data.summary: Mining industry study using linear regression shows transformational and participatory leadership styles significantly improve employee performance and organizational commitment.

data.title: Performance evaluation of osmotically assisted reverse osmosis for potassium lactate draw solution recovery: Experimental assessment and process simulation
data.sub_theme: osmotically assisted reverse osmosis

data.title: Mechanisms of emotional eating: food approach bias covaries with affect on days with high food craving

data.summary: Ecological momentary assessment study of 76 participants finds affect and food approach bias covary on high-craving days, with negative affect linked to increased approach bias in emotional eaters.

data.title: Recent advances in thermomechanical properties of PLA-based biopolymer composites for biomedical applications
data.sub_theme: PLA-based biopolymer composites for biomedical applications
data.summary: Narrative review of PLA-based biopolymer composites for biomedical applications highlights thermomechanical properties, with PLA/FGNP showing 261% enhancement in elastic modulus and PLA/HA improving thermal stability for bone regeneration.

data.title: Reshaping the cardiovascular continuum in the management of arterial and venous cardiovascular disease: a narrative review
data.sub_theme: cardiovascular disease management
data.summary: Narrative review describes interconnectedness of arterial and venous cardiovascular disease, recommending integrated multidisciplinary care with combination therapy and digital tools to manage shared risk factors.

data.title: Mean and Variance For the Visit Time of Absorbing Quantum Walks and Channels

data.summary: Mathematical study develops methods for calculating mean and variance of visit times in absorbing quantum walks and channels, using quantum Markov chain theory.

data.title: Card guessing after an asymmetric riffle shuffle
data.sub_theme: card guessing strategy after riffle shuffle
data.summary: Mathematical analysis of optimal guessing strategy for card prediction game after unbalanced riffle shuffle, characterizing distribution of correct guesses.

data.title: Agile Product Development in Healthcare Innovation Pipelines: Measuring Efficiency Gains through Iterative Data Science Integration
data.journal: International Journal of Innovative Science and Research Technology (IJISRT)
data.sub_theme: Agile product development, healthcare innovation, data science integration
data.summary: A quantitative-dominant mixed-methods study demonstrated that analytics-enabled Agile execution in healthcare innovation pipelines reduced cycle time, improved decision velocity, and enhanced regulatory readiness simultaneously.

data.title: Data-Centric Business Analysis in Agile Software Development to Fortify Cybersecurity Posture for U.S. Healthcare Systems
data.sub_theme: cybersecurity, Agile methodology, healthcare data protection
data.summary: A mixed-methods study combining systematic literature review (127 studies), multi-vocal analysis, Design Science Research, and Delphi validation with 23 cybersecurity experts developed the Agile-Healthcare Cybersecurity Analytics Framework to integrate data security throughout Agile development cycles.

data.title: Designing End-to-End IT Ecosystems for Greenfield Dairy/Food Manufacturing Plants: Integration Challenges and Solutions
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: IT ecosystem architecture, manufacturing integration, dairy/food production
data.summary: An architectural case study of end-to-end IT ecosystem design in a greenfield dairy manufacturing plant demonstrated 18% cycle time reduction, 99.2% inventory accuracy, and 15% distribution efficiency improvement through integrated ERP and specialized platforms.

data.title: The therapy of typing: perspectives on the Myers–Briggs type indicator role in identity and community making
data.sub_theme: personality typing, identity construction, community formation, Myers-Briggs
data.summary: A phenomenological study of 22 MBTI community members found that personality typing functions as 'typing therapy,' with 86.4% reporting emotional relief and 77.3% strengthened self-concept through dialectical cycles of type recognition, community engagement, and social validation.

data.title: Implementation of biobanking modules in the education of medical students and residents
data.sub_theme: biobanking education, medical training, resident education
data.summary: A retrospective study at two medical institutions found that short-term biobanking educational modules for 75 residents and 19 students were highly effective, with 100% achieving neutral or positive attitudes and 34.7% of residents proceeding to postgraduate education.

data.title: Designing End-to-End IT Ecosystems for Greenfield Dairy/Food Manufacturing Plants: Integration Challenges and Solutions
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)

data.summary: An architectural case study of end-to-end IT ecosystem design in a greenfield dairy manufacturing plant demonstrated 18% cycle time reduction, 99.2% inventory accuracy, and 15% distribution efficiency improvement through integrated ERP and specialized platforms.

data.title: Leveraging Big Data for Predictive Risk Analytics in Auditing: Enhancing Assurance Services in Manufacturing Organisations.
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)

data.summary: Regression-based panel analysis of 60 manufacturing firms shows predictive analytics adoption significantly improves audit quality and fraud detection across developed and emerging economies.

data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: predictive analytics in auditing
data.summary: Regression-based panel analysis of 60 manufacturing firms shows predictive analytics adoption significantly improves audit quality and fraud detection across developed and emerging economies.

data.title: Identifying massive black hole binaries via light curve variability in optical time-domain surveys
data.sub_theme: astrophysics simulation and light curve analysis
data.summary: Hydrodynamic simulations and periodogram analysis of massive black hole binary light curves predict detection rates of 10^-2 to 10^-1 systems per square degree in LSST surveys with higher success for eccentric systems.

data.title: Integrating Agile Software Development, Advanced Cybersecurity Protocols, and Predictive Business Analytics for Safeguarding U.S. Critical Infrastructure Networks
data.journal: Journal of Artificial Intelligence and Technological Development
data.sub_theme: cybersecurity and predictive threat analytics
data.summary: Longitudinal case study integrating Agile development, zero-trust security, and machine learning (isolation forest, LSTM) in two U.S. critical infrastructure sectors achieved 91% accuracy in predicting attack vectors 72 hours in advance and 68% MTTD reduction.

data.title: Replicating the Success of the American Research Ecosystem Everywhere: Towards Quantum Advancements of Science in the Developing World
data.journal: International Journal of Innovative Science and Research Technology (IJISRT)

data.summary: Narrative review examining the American research ecosystem and university system with recommendations for replicating success in developing countries to advance global science.

data.title: Experiences of Tertiary Science Teachers on Math Integration in Science Instruction
data.sub_theme: mathematics integration in science teaching
data.summary: Qualitative phenomenological study of tertiary science teachers' experiences integrating mathematics into science instruction, identifying barriers and pedagogical strategies used.

data.title: An AI-driven framework for predicting sleep quality and delivering personalized recommendations using digital wellbeing and lifestyle data
data.sub_theme: AI-driven sleep quality prediction
data.summary: Machine learning system using Random Forest and XGBoost to predict sleep quality from behavioral and digital wellbeing data without specialized hardware, providing personalized recommendations.

data.summary: Randomized controlled trial examining the mirror exercise intervention on vulva self-image in college women, finding significant improvements especially when combined with mindfulness practice.

data.summary: Posthumanist literary analysis of H.G. Wells' The War of the Worlds examining Martians as symbolic representations of artificial intelligence as a technological colonizer threatening human identity and agency.

data.title: REGARDING THE LEGITIMACY OF JUDICIAL SUPREMACY IN EXERCISING CONSTITUTIONAL REVIEW (DEFENSE AND CRITICISMS)

data.summary: Bibliographic essay analyzing the legitimacy of judicial supremacy in constitutional review, presenting defenses and criticisms of the Supreme Court's role in constitutional control within democratic systems.

data.summary: Bibliographical essay on the legitimacy of judicial supremacy in constitutional review within democratic regimes, arguing that constitutional interpretation should be transparent and objective without judicial discretion.

data.sub_theme: wearable activity trackers, physical activity monitoring

data.title: Overtraining syndrome in athletes: diagnosis and correction
data.sub_theme: overtraining syndrome, cardiorespiratory adaptation

data.title: Understanding Upper Extremity Injury Prevalence and Risk in Pickleball Players: A Nationwide Survey
data.sub_theme: upper extremity injury prevalence and risk factors
data.summary: A cross-sectional survey of 1,758 pickleball players found that 39.3% reported upper extremity injuries annually, with male sex, increased play frequency, shorter play history, and low perceived injury prevention importance as significant predictors.

data.title: Soft Tissue Stiffness and Functional Knee Outcomes in Female Handball Players Following a Knee Injury: A Cross-Sectional Study
data.sub_theme: knee injury, soft tissue stiffness, functional outcomes
data.summary: In female handball players with previous knee injury, patellar tendon stiffness was significantly higher than controls but negatively correlated with clinical knee function assessments, suggesting a maladaptive response.

data.title: Case Report: Hyperlactation and Sport Performance in an Elite Marathon Runner

data.title: Research on the Interactive Relationship Between Digital Transformation, Capital Structure and Corporate Performance — An Empirical Analysis Based on A-Share Listed Companies
data.sub_theme: digital transformation and corporate finance
data.summary: Panel data analysis of Chinese listed companies shows digital transformation has a weak negative short-term effect on performance due to costs, with capital structure playing a mediating role.

data.title: Comparative Analysis of Extracellular Vesicle Isolation From Equine Serum and Plasma Using Two Isolation Methods With Structural and Proteomic Validation
data.summary: Methodological study compares two extracellular vesicle isolation methods from equine serum and plasma, evaluating efficiency and proteomic composition.

data.title: Switching patients from cinacalcet to etelcalcetide: evaluation of predictors of efficacy in a retrospective cohort study
data.summary: Retrospective cohort study evaluates etelcalcetide efficacy in switching dialysis patients from cinacalcet, identifying parathyroid autonomy as predictor of treatment outcomes.

data.title: Revisiting the exoplanet radius valley with host stars from SWEET-Cat
data.sub_theme: exoplanet radius valley analysis
data.summary: Analysis of exoplanet radius valley using stellar parameters from SWEET-Cat shows valley depends on period, flux, and stellar mass, with evidence for prolonged atmospheric loss.

data.title: Peningkatan Literasi Struktural Melalui Pendampingan Teknis Analisis Struktur pada Pembangunan Gedung NU di Desa Kalisoka Kab Tegal
data.sub_theme: structural engineering for building construction
data.summary: Community service project applying structural engineering analysis to design a building in Indonesia using SAP2000 software and national standards.

data.title: RTLI Corridor Update v5: Pluto-Constrained Geometry, KQ14 Validation, and a Collapsed Single-Tile Apex for a ~7 M⊕, ~620 AU, i ≈ 32° Hidden Massive Body
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: exoplanet diagnostic framework
data.summary: Technical framework for saturation diagnostics applied to exoplanet systems, including analysis of radius gap as failed-configuration zone.

data.title: RTLI Corridor Update v5: Pluto-Constrained Geometry, KQ14 Validation, and a Collapsed Single-Tile Apex for a ~7 M⊕, ~620 AU, i ≈ 32° Hidden Massive Body
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: exoplanet diagnostic framework
data.summary: Technical framework for saturation diagnostics applied to exoplanet systems, including analysis of radius gap as failed-configuration zone.

data.title: Physical exercise is the best therapy in reducing interleukin-6 levels as an inflammatory mediator: a systematic review
data.sub_theme: physical exercise, interleukin-6, inflammation
data.summary: A systematic review demonstrates that chronic physical exercise reduces interleukin-6 levels and systemic inflammation, while acute exercise temporarily increases IL-6 as part of normal physiological adaptation.

data.title: Anthropometric Determinants of Rowing Performance in a Multinational Youth Cohort
data.journal: Journal of Functional Morphology and Kinesiology
data.sub_theme: anthropometric talent identification, youth cohort
data.summary: Rowing performance in a multinational youth cohort of 194 athletes was strongly determined by body surface area (r=0.739), relative muscle mass (r=0.531), and segmental body dimensions, with benchmark values of ~1.90 m² BSA and ~40% relative muscle mass identifying higher-performing athletes.

data.title: Prevalence and risk factors of stress urinary incontinence among female horseback riders in Poland
data.sub_theme: stress urinary incontinence, pelvic floor, horseback riding
data.summary: Among 100 Polish female horseback riders, 36% reported stress urinary incontinence with significantly impaired quality of life; age and BMI were independent risk factors, while longer training experience correlated with lower symptom distress.

data.title: Highly Selective and Flexible HCl Sensor Enabled by Ag <sub>2</sub> O‐Functionalized Graphene Micropatterns
data.summary: Ag₂O-functionalized graphene micropatterns achieve ultra-high selectivity for hydrogen chloride detection at parts-per-trillion levels with enhanced room-temperature sensitivity via charge-depletion mechanisms.

data.title: Manajemen Supervisi dalam Pendidikan: Perspektif Kontemporer
data.sub_theme: Educational supervision management in Islamic context
data.summary: Qualitative review of contemporary educational supervision management integrating Islamic values, pedagogical coaching, and digital learning technologies.

data.title: Rehabilitation and return to activity after platelet‐rich plasma injections in chronic tendinopathies: Consensus from international experts
data.sub_theme: platelet-rich plasma injection rehabilitation protocols
data.summary: Delphi consensus methodology established 10 evidence-based recommendations for post-PRP injection rehabilitation and return-to-activity timelines in chronic tendinopathies across multiple sports.

data.title: Pengaruh Kinerja Keuangan Dan Manajemen Risiko Terhadap Nilai Perusahaan Perbankan Yang Terdaftar Di Bursa Efek Indonesia Periode 2019-2024
data.summary: Panel data regression analysis of financial performance (ROA) and risk management (NPL) on banking company value in Indonesia found joint but not individual significance.

data.title: PENERAPAN ALGORITMA BRANCH AND BOUND DENGAN STATISTIK EXPECTED GOALS UNTUK MENENTUKAN KOMBINASI PASSING OPTIMAL DALAM SEPAK BOLA
data.sub_theme: optimal passing combinations, expected goals
data.summary: Study proposes Branch and Bound algorithm combined with Expected Goals statistics to identify optimal passing combinations in football that maximize goal-scoring chances.

data.title: The Dynamics of Implementing E-Evaluation in Islamic Boarding Schools: A Solution-Oriented Study
data.summary: Conceptual study examines digital transformation and e-evaluation implementation in Islamic boarding schools using content analysis.

data.title: IMPLEMENTASI METODE BACKWARD CHAINING SEBAGAI INFERENSI SISTEM PAKAR DIAGNOSA KERUSAKAN TANAH UNTUK PENANAMAN TANAMAN OPTIMAL
data.journal: Jurnal Informatika dan Teknik Elektro Terapan
data.summary: Study implements backward chaining expert system to diagnose soil damage and recommend optimal crops for agricultural planting.

data.title: Mechanisms of emotional eating: food approach bias covaries with affect on days with high food craving
data.summary: Study investigates mechanisms of emotional eating using ecological momentary assessment and mobile approach-avoidance tasks, finding affect-approach bias covariation on high-craving days.

data.title: Lensing the darkness: The matter density profile in cosmic voids from UNIONS
data.journal: Monthly Notices of the Royal Astronomical Society
data.summary: Astrophysics study measures matter density profiles in cosmic voids using weak gravitational lensing from UNIONS survey data.

data.title: Core–Periphery Dynamics in Hungarian Handball: Regional Disparities and Gendered Patterns
data.sub_theme: spatial inequalities and gendered patterns in handball
data.summary: Analysis of Hungarian handball championships (184 teams across divisions) using ANOVA and Moran's I spatial analysis reveals significant regional disparities with stronger spatial concentration in women's leagues, correlating with socioeconomic development and highlighting need for integrated sport and regional development strategies.

data.title: Mathematical model to support the identification of young football players with sufficient physical fitness to join professional women's teams
data.journal: International Journal of Sports Science & Coaching
data.sub_theme: talent identification, physical fitness criteria, youth to professional transition
data.summary: Discriminant function analysis model using countermovement jump, 20-m sprint, change of direction, and Yo-Yo Intermittent Recovery test identified that only 26.1% of youth female football players in Brazil met the physical profile of professional players, with change of direction showing strongest predictive value (r=-0.855).

data.title: Cross-Sectional Associations of Sport Participation, Academic Performance, and Psychological Well-Being Among Rural Romanian Adolescent Boys in the Context of Family Background
data.sub_theme: academic performance, psychological well-being, socioeconomic factors
data.summary: Among rural Romanian adolescent boys aged 11-14, football and judo players demonstrated significantly higher academic achievement and life satisfaction than non-athletes, though athletes also showed slightly elevated depressive symptoms, with family socioeconomic background playing a moderating role.

data.title: Comparing the Efficacy of Professional Athlete-Led Online Instruction and Traditional Coaching for Developing Technical Competencies in Novice Sepak Takraw Players: A 12-Week Randomised Controlled Study
data.sub_theme: online coaching, technical skill development, sepak takraw
data.summary: Professional athlete-led online instruction proved significantly more effective than traditional in-person coaching for developing technical skills in novice sepak takraw players aged 14-17, with service accuracy improving 38.67 points versus 16.76 points in the control group.

data.title: Diamond Sensor Technologies: From Multi Stimulus to Quantum
data.summary: Review of diamond-based sensor technologies across mechanical, thermal, magnetic, radiation, biosensing, and quantum applications, addressing material properties and persistent engineering challenges.

data.title: BN-Engineered Quasi-2D Fullerene Monolayers as High-Performance Platforms for Volatile Organic Compound Capture and Detection
data.summary: DFT simulations demonstrate that controlled BN substitution in C₆₀ fullerene monolayers dramatically enhances volatile organic compound adsorption and detection, particularly for polar molecules like formaldehyde.

data.title: Integrated Human-Centered Artificial Intelligence (HCAI) Performance & Development Model: Bridging the Policy-to-Practice Divide in Performance Management and Employee Development
data.journal: Advances in Machine Learning & Artificial Intelligence
data.sub_theme: Human-centered AI framework for performance management
data.summary: Conceptual model integrating human-centered AI principles with performance management and employee development to bridge policy-practice gaps in HR systems.

data.title: Characteristics of goal situations when using tactical models in the training process of football players
data.sub_theme: tactical models, goal situations, team play interactions, training effectiveness
data.summary: A 12-month experimental study with 22 university football players found that implementing tactical models during training significantly increased goal situations arising from player interactions in midfield/flanks and from forward/midfielder actions, particularly in minutes 61–90 of matches.

data.title: RSM - A Universal Carrier‑Free Separator Grammar with Z2
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Mathematical framework for analyzing transport barriers and separators in dynamical systems across fluid dynamics, phase-field thermodynamics, and chaotic iteration.

data.title: Financial Performance Analysis of Selected IT Companies in India: An Empirical Study
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Empirical analysis of financial performance metrics (ROE, EPS, P/E ratio) across selected Indian IT companies reveals variations in operational efficiency and market performance.

data.title: RSM - A Universal Carrier‑Free Separator Grammar with Z2
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Mathematical framework for analyzing transport barriers and separators in dynamical systems across fluid dynamics, phase-field thermodynamics, and chaotic iteration.

data.title: Financial Performance Analysis of Selected IT Companies in India: An Empirical Study
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Empirical analysis of financial performance metrics (ROE, EPS, P/E ratio) across selected Indian IT companies reveals variations in operational efficiency and market performance.

data.title: Dividend Policy and Its Impact on Financial Performance and Corporate Social Responsibility: a Literature Study
data.summary: Systematic literature review of 20 articles examining relationships between dividend policy, financial performance (ROA, ROE), and corporate social responsibility in firms.

data.title: Delayering the reference coal price to maximize coal non-tax state revenue
data.summary: Policy analysis of Indonesian coal royalty pricing structure recommends delayering reference coal prices to maximize non-tax state revenue.

data.title: AI Co-Scientist for Knowledge Synthesis in Medical Contexts: A Proof of Concept
data.sub_theme: AI for evidence synthesis, PICOS classification, biomedical research
data.summary: Development of an AI platform using transformer-based NLP for automated PICOS extraction and study design classification in biomedical evidence synthesis with 95.7% accuracy; not specifically sports-focused despite dementia-sport corpus inclusion.

data.title: Picophytoplankton implicated in productivity and biogeochemistry in the North Pacific Transition Zone
data.sub_theme: marine biology, phytoplankton biogeochemistry
data.summary: This paper on picophytoplankton taxonomy and North Pacific biogeochemistry is not related to sports and appears to be a false positive from keyword search.

data.title: Hierarchical deep reinforcement learning for real-time tactical decision-making in team sports
data.sub_theme: hierarchical deep reinforcement learning, real-time decision-making, explainable AI
data.summary: A hierarchical deep reinforcement learning framework using graph neural networks and transformers for tactical decision-making in basketball, soccer, and rugby achieved 34.7% higher tactical accuracy and identified 17 novel tactical patterns, improving youth team performance by 42.3%.

data.title: Using Machine-Learning Algorithms to Predict Self-Reported Problem Gambling Among a Sample of Online Gamblers
data.journal: International Journal of Mental Health and Addiction
data.sub_theme: problem gambling prediction, responsible gambling
data.summary: This study on predicting problem gambling using machine learning algorithms is not related to sports performance or health and appears to be a false positive from keyword search.

data.title: Investigating the Burden of Tax Compliance on Small and Medium Enterprises and Its Influence on Business Expansion and Profitability
data.summary: Study examines tax compliance burdens on SMEs and their impact on business growth, profitability, and innovation using survey-based empirical data.

data.title: Optimal Abatement Schedules for Excess Carbon Emissions Towards a Net-Zero Target
data.summary: Paper applies stochastic control theory to optimize carbon emission reduction schedules for achieving net-zero targets.

data.title: Biodiversity credits and offsets (THINK NATURE CONCEPT DOCUMENT #5)
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.summary: Concept document reviewing biodiversity offsetting frameworks, design factors, and environmental mitigation strategies.

data.title: PHYSIOLOGICAL CHARACTERISTICS IN SUCCESSFUL FEMALE SINGLE FIGURE SKATING ATHLETES
data.sub_theme: talent identification, physiological profiling
data.summary: Physiological and psychophysiological testing of 30 female figure skaters identified characteristics differentiating successful from less successful competitors, supporting early talent allocation for women's national teams.

data.title: Controls of spatial variation in stream temperature
data.sub_theme: stream temperature, hydrology, thermal heterogeneity
data.summary: Educational lesson on spatial variation in stream temperature and factors influencing thermal heterogeneity in river reaches.

data.title: The Effects of Percussion Therapy (Theragun™) on Recovery from Contraction-Induced Muscle Damage in Highly Trained Participants
data.sub_theme: percussion therapy, muscle damage recovery
data.summary: Percussion therapy (Theragun) showed no significant benefit for muscle soreness or strength recovery following eccentric hamstring exercise in highly trained participants, though it reduced range of motion acutely.

data.title: Effect of proprioceptive neuromuscular facilitation on pain and joint mobility in knee osteoarthritis: a systematic review and meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials
data.sub_theme: proprioceptive neuromuscular facilitation, knee osteoarthritis
data.summary: Proprioceptive neuromuscular facilitation (PNF) demonstrated significantly greater pain reduction and range of motion improvement compared to control in knee osteoarthritis patients, though clinical significance was below minimal clinically important difference.

data.title: Effect of Virechana Karma in Ekakusta w.s.r. to Plaque Psoriasis - A Case Study
data.journal: Journal of Ayurveda and Integrated Medical Sciences
data.sub_theme: Ayurvedic treatment for psoriasis
data.summary: A case study of Ayurvedic treatment (Virechana Karma) for plaque psoriasis showing improvement with combined internal and external therapies.

data.title: Bonded Green Exercise: A One Health Framework for Shared Nature-Based Physical Activity in the Human–Dog Dyad
data.sub_theme: human-dog physical activity, nature-based exercise
data.summary: A conceptual framework proposes that bonded green exercise (shared physical activity between humans and dogs in nature) may produce synergistic health benefits through co-regulation mechanisms in both species.

data.title: Transcranial direct current stimulation combined with exercise therapy for chronic low back pain: a systematic review and meta-analysis
data.sub_theme: transcranial direct current stimulation, chronic low back pain
data.summary: Transcranial direct current stimulation combined with exercise showed a modest but significant additive reduction in pain intensity for chronic low back pain compared to sham stimulation plus exercise, with effect moderated by intervention duration.

data.title: SPORT LAW AND SPORT MEDICINE
data.sub_theme: sports law, legal protection
data.summary: Essay on sports law as a legal discipline providing protection to athletes and stakeholders in professional sports, emphasizing parental role in athlete development and career success.

data.title: Development of team-based and individualised speed zone thresholds for elite club-level women’s soccer
data.sub_theme: speed zone thresholds via clustering
data.summary: Data-mining approach using spectral clustering on GPS data from 47 elite female soccer players generated team-based (1.12, 2.83, 5.10 m·s⁻¹) and individualized speed zone thresholds that better capture women's soccer demands than existing male-derived standards.

data.title: Establishing Normative Data for Single- and Dual-Task Tandem Gait in Healthy Interuniversity Male and Female Athletes
data.sub_theme: gender differences in concussion assessment, normative data
data.summary: Study of 103 interuniversity athletes established that healthy female athletes performed single- and dual-task tandem gait significantly slower than males (1.6-2.8 seconds difference), with most athletes performing below SCOAT6 'normal' criteria, suggesting need for gender-specific normative values.

data.title: Boosting Chirality Transfer in Chiral Perovskites via Structural Asymmetry Regulation Enables High‐Performance Self‐Driven Full‐Stokes Polarimetry
data.summary: Sb³⁺ doping enhances chiroptical activity in chiral perovskites, enabling self-driven full-Stokes polarimetry with high circular polarization sensitivity through symmetry-breaking lattice distortions.

data.title: Igniting Work Passion: Transformative Role of AI in Employee Engagement
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: AI in human resource management and employee engagement
data.summary: Review of AI mechanisms for enhancing employee engagement through predictive analytics for attrition forecasting, NLP sentiment analysis for organizational health monitoring, and personalized interventions.

data.title: PEMBINAAN EKSTRAKURIKULER MAPSI DAN OSN SEBAGAI WADAH PENGEMBANGAN POTENSI, PRESTASI, DAN KARAKTER RELIGIUS SISWA
data.sub_theme: extracurricular Islamic and science coaching for student development
data.summary: Community service program at Indonesian middle school strengthened extracurricular coaching in Islamic subjects and National Science Olympiad, achieving 95% participation and improved student discipline and competition success.

data.title: Precision Education in Health Sciences Education: A Call-to-Action for Developing an Interprofessional Strategy.
data.sub_theme: precision education in health sciences using AI and learning analytics
data.summary: Call-to-action for interprofessional precision education strategy in health sciences combining competency-based education with AI, learning analytics, and continuous feedback to personalize learning while upholding equity.

data.title: Igniting Work Passion: Transformative Role of AI in Employee Engagement
data.journal: Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research)
data.sub_theme: AI in human resource management and employee engagement
data.summary: Review of AI mechanisms for enhancing employee engagement through predictive analytics for attrition forecasting, NLP sentiment analysis for organizational health monitoring, and personalized interventions.

data.title: Reclaiming Urban Currents
data.journal: tba Journal of Art Media and Visual Culture
data.sub_theme: Indigenous public art, urban space, colonialism
data.summary: Qualitative essay on Indigenous public art installations in Canadian cities as counter-narratives to settler colonialism and urban erasure, focusing on artist Maureen Gruben's work.

data.title: EXPLORING THE ROLE OF LIVING ROOTS IN SOIL ORGANIC MATTER DYNAMICS
data.sub_theme: soil organic matter, living roots, cover crops
data.summary: Meta-analysis and field experiment demonstrating that living root inputs are essential for maintaining soil organic matter and carbon sequestration in continuous cropping systems.

data.title: The Wiener Wintner and Return Times Theorem Along the Primes
data.sub_theme: ergodic theory, prime numbers, Fourier analysis
data.summary: Pure mathematics paper proving an extension of the Return Times Theorem along prime sequences using ergodic theory and higher-order Fourier analysis.

data.title: Return to High-Speed Running After a Hamstring Injury in Soccer: A Scoping Review About Criteria and Management of On-Field Rehabilitation
data.sub_theme: hamstring injury, return to high-speed running, rehabilitation progression
data.summary: Scoping review of criteria and on-field rehabilitation protocols for progression to high-speed running in soccer players recovering from hamstring injuries.

data.title: Traditional leadership and sustainable crime prevention in rural South Africa: A qualitative study of the Amathole District Municipality under COGTA
data.journal: International Journal of Research in Business and Social Science (2147-4478)
data.sub_theme: rural crime prevention, traditional leadership, South Africa
data.summary: Qualitative study examining the role of traditional leadership and community-based policing in sustainable crime prevention in rural South Africa.

data.title: Determinants of Manufacturing Firm Performance with Firm Size Moderation
data.sub_theme: manufacturing firm performance, corporate governance, firm size moderation
data.summary: Panel data study of Indonesian manufacturing firms examining how board size, ownership structure, leverage, tangible assets, and market valuation relate to firm performance with firm size as a moderator.

data.title: THE EFFECT OF COMPANY SIZE, DEBT TO EQUITY RATIO, AND RETURN ON EQUITY RATIO ON DIVIDEND PAYOUT RATIO IN FOOD AND BEVERAGE COMPANIES LISTED ON THE INDONESIA STOCK EXCHANGE FROM 2019 TO 2024
data.summary: Multiple linear regression analysis of financial ratios (company size, debt-to-equity, ROE) on dividend payout in Indonesian food and beverage companies found company size significantly predicts dividend policy while debt and ROE do not.

data.title: Kinematic variables influencing somersault turn time in medley swimmers using artificial neural networks (ANN)
data.sub_theme: somersault turn technique optimization
data.summary: Artificial neural networks applied to kinematic data from youth medley swimmers identify that somersault turn performance is governed by complex nonlinear interactions among lower-limb joint angles, trunk positioning, and propulsion variables rather than single biomechanical factors.

data.title: Objective measures of physical activity and physical capacities in lipedema - a scooping review
data.sub_theme: lipedema, physical activity, objective assessment
data.summary: Scoping review of 6 studies shows individuals with lipedema exhibit lower walking capacity and muscle strength, with multimodal exercise programs producing improvements in function.

data.title: <b>The Role of Cardiopulmonary Physical Therapy in Promoting Healthy Aging and Preventing Age-Related Respiratory Problems: A Systematic Review</b>
data.journal: Journal of Health Wellness and Community Research
data.sub_theme: cardiopulmonary physical therapy, aging, respiratory health
data.summary: Systematic review of 10 studies shows cardiopulmonary physical therapy improves exercise capacity and quality of life in older adults but evidence for preventive effects on respiratory decline remains limited.

data.title: Post-activation potentiation enhancement induction strategies with different rest intervals on jump performance: a meta-analysis
data.sub_theme: post-activation potentiation, jump performance, rest intervals
data.summary: Meta-analysis of 22 RCTs (468 participants) demonstrates post-activation potentiation significantly enhances jump performance, with optimal effects using back squats, moderate intensity, and 3-7 minute rest intervals.

data.title: The Saffron State: An analysis of Bureaucratic and Administrative Development of India Under Modi from 2018-2022
data.sub_theme: Indian bureaucratic governance, saffronization
data.summary: Political science case study analyzing institutional capture and ideological influence in Indian government bureaucracy from 2018-2022.

data.title: An Updated Insight into the Phytomolecules Reported for the Treatment of ColonCancer from 2015 to 2024
data.sub_theme: phytomolecules, colon cancer treatment
data.summary: Literature review of phytochemical compounds and their mechanisms for managing colon cancer from 2015-2024.

data.title: Digitally Driven Lifestyle Modification Programs Incorporating Exercise, Patient Education, and Dietary Interventions After Total Knee Arthroplasty: Protocol for a Systematic Review and Network Meta-Analysis (Preprint)
data.sub_theme: total knee arthroplasty, rehabilitation, digital health, lifestyle modification
data.summary: Protocol for systematic review and network meta-analysis comparing digitally-supported exercise, patient education, and dietary interventions for post-TKA rehabilitation outcomes.

data.title: The effect of different exercise interventions on global cognitive function in patients with type 2 diabetes: a systematic review and network meta-analysis
data.sub_theme: exercise interventions, cognitive function, type 2 diabetes
data.summary: Network meta-analysis of 21 RCTs (2,118 participants) shows multimodal, mind-body, and aerobic exercise significantly improve global cognitive function in type 2 diabetes patients, with multimodal showing highest efficacy.

data.title: A087: Assessment of Table Tennis Stroke Effectiveness using the Artificial Intelligence Technology-Based Algorithm
data.sub_theme: forehand stroke kinematics, dynamic time-warping
data.summary: Dynamic time-warping AI algorithm successfully distinguished table tennis stroke effectiveness between beginner and intermediate players by analyzing elbow angle differences in forehand strokes, with DTW values showing large effect sizes (Cohen's d=0.86).

data.title: Prevalence of Apical Periodontitis, Alveolar Bone Loss, and Root‐Filled Teeth Among Olympic Athletes
data.sub_theme: dental health
data.summary: Prevalence study found apical periodontitis in 33.9% of Olympic athletes with 52.9% of root-filled teeth showing periapical pathology, indicating high endodontic treatment needs among this population.

data.title: A153: Rehabilitation Research on Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome (PFPS) in Female Judo Athletes
data.sub_theme: patellofemoral pain syndrome, core stability rehabilitation
data.summary: Six-week core and functional training program significantly improved Lysholm and IKDC scores and corrected hip-knee muscle imbalances in female judo athletes with patellofemoral pain syndrome, compared to controls.

data.title: A130: Comparative Analysis of Aerobic Capacity in Female College Golfers of Different Levels
data.sub_theme: aerobic capacity, VO2max
data.summary: Female college golfers at higher skill levels (N1 group) demonstrated more efficient aerobic capacity with higher VO₂/kg, lower energy expenditure, and better ventilatory efficiency during treadmill testing compared to general-level golfers.

data.title: A128: Correlation Between Balance Ability and Stroke Effectiveness in Female Golfers
data.sub_theme: balance ability, stroke effectiveness
data.summary: Balance ability tests revealed that dynamic balance (particularly D1 and D10 conditions) was positively correlated with driver stroke effectiveness (Smash distance) in female golfers, with national first-class athletes showing superior stability.

data.title: A061: Analysis of the Current Situation of Table Tennis Players' Burnout
data.sub_theme: athlete burnout
data.summary: Survey of table tennis players using the Athlete Burnout Questionnaire found that older players and those with longer training durations exhibited significantly higher burnout levels, while gender and sports grade showed no significant differences.

data.title: A018: Impact of Unanticipated and Backhand Area Smash Landing on Female Badminton Players’ Lower Limb Biomechanics
data.sub_theme: lower limb kinematics, landing mechanics, injury risk
data.summary: Motion capture analysis of female badminton players revealed that unanticipated backhand smash landings produced higher knee extension moments and vertical load rates, with movement type (rear vs. lateral) significantly affecting frontal plane biomechanics and injury risk.

data.title: A207: AI Era and Sports Equity: A Sociological Perspective
data.sub_theme: AI bias, equity, inclusion, talent selection
data.summary: Qualitative study found that while AI-driven training improves accessibility, AI in officiating and talent selection raises fairness concerns, with evidence that AI metrics favor well-funded programs and male performance data, potentially overlooking diverse female talents.

data.title: A231: Effects of a Six-Week Pre-Competition Program on Blood Biomarkers in Female Adolescent Rowers
data.sub_theme: blood biomarkers, training adaptation
data.summary: Six-week pre-competition training in adolescent female rowers produced beneficial hematological adaptations (increased RBC and MCV) and favorable endocrine changes (increased testosterone and T/C ratio), indicating positive training-induced physiological responses.

data.title: A186: Evaluating Badminton-Specific Court Testing: A Systematic Review
data.sub_theme: badminton-specific fitness testing, field tests
data.summary: Systematic review of 15 studies evaluating badminton-specific court tests found 13 of 15 tests (7 endurance, 8 agility) demonstrated high reliability and validity for assessing sport-specific movement demands, though questions remain on ecological validity of current assessments.

data.title: Caffeine ingestion before exercise improves prolonged intermittent-sprint performance of team-sport athletes in normobaric hypoxia
data.sub_theme: caffeine supplementation, hypoxic performance
data.summary: Caffeine ingestion at 6 mg/kg significantly improved prolonged intermittent-sprint performance in team-sport athletes under normobaric hypoxia, increasing total work done by 5-6% across both halves of the test.

data.title: Prevalence of exercise-induced bronchoconstriction in elite Chinese summer sport athletes
data.sub_theme: exercise-induced bronchoconstriction, sport-specific prevalence
data.summary: Exercise-induced bronchoconstriction prevalence in 500 Chinese elite summer sport athletes was 27.6%, highest in swimming (51.52%) and lowest in wrestling (6.45%), with female athletes showing higher prevalence than males (31.1% vs. 23.7%).

data.title: Influence of Motor Abilities on Throwing Performance Across Motor Learning Stages in Physically Active Female Athletes
data.sub_theme: motor abilities, throwing technique, learning stages
data.summary: In female track and field athletes learning shot put, discus, and javelin, upper-body explosive strength was the primary predictor of performance, with its effect strengthening across motor learning stages while maximal strength became significant only in final stages.

data.title: Variances in Power Output of Female Athletes During the Menstrual Phases
data.sub_theme: menstrual cycle, power output, female athletes
data.summary: Analysis of three elite female athletes across 13 weeks found trends of small declines in propulsive and braking power during the luteal phase of the menstrual cycle, though differences were not statistically significant.

data.title: A187: The Comprehensive Impact of Competitive Liondance on Bio-Psycho-Social Health: Cohort Tracking Study of Elite Athletes
data.sub_theme: competitive lion dance, bio-psycho-social health
